x1b1(brgyad stong): oM swa sti sing d+ha~M/ mig sngar rab mdzes mdzes pa'i sku byad dang / rna bar gang mdzes mdzes pa'i gsung dbyangs dang // yid la gang mdzes mdzes pa'i thugs blo can/ kun mkhyen mkhyen pa'i dbang po deng 'dir rgyal// de gsung gsung gi bdud rtsi mtshar du dang ra/ rab myangs myangs pa'i mo
x1b2(brgyad stong): la tshang rdungs sel/ legs lam lam gyi mchog gyur lung rtogs chos// dam chos chos kyi dga' ston rgyas rgyur cig/ dge legs legs pa'i lam lnga rab brten te// rab dga' dga' ba'i sa sogs nyer drod nas// rnam mang mang po'i mgon gyur dge ba'i bshes// 'phags tshogs tsho gas
x1b3(brgyad stong): mchog gyur dge 'dun rgyal// tshad med thugs rje'i lcags kyu gcig gis kyang // 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'gro ba kun bzung nas// rnam grol byang chub skam sar 'dren mdzad pa// yum chen pha rol phyin ma khyod yin no// zag med mngal phyin rgyal sras slob mar bcas// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' las
x1b4(brgyad stong): mu med na// dpag med 'gro ba'i don du su zhugs pa// bla med sras kyi tshogs la phyag bgyi'o// mkhyen ldan thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdud las rgyal/ rgyal ba'i rgyal tshab rgyal sras mi pham mgon// mgon de'i zhal gzigs 'phags pa thogs med zhabs// zhabs bzung gu s+ye sten mkhas
x1b5(brgyad stong): mchog dbyig giHgnyen// gnyen gyur thugs mnga' 'phags pa rnam grol sde// de sogs par phyin pargyud pa'i bla ma mchod// sangs rgyas stong gi yab gyur snang ba mtha'// mtha' yas 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten dbang // dbang 'byor sna tshogs skur ston srong btsan rgam// rgam po'i
x1b6(brgyad stong): spyo mdzad klu grub pad+ma rdor// rdo rje'i sku mnyes sgrub chen dngos grub zhabs// de sogs 'gro 'dul brgyud pa'i bla ma mchod// kun mkhyen mkhyen pa'i dbang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// thugs rje rje btsun dam pa spyan ras gzigs// mthu stobs stobs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzim// rigs gsum rigs/ 
x1b7(brgyad stong): kyi mgon po rtag tu rgyal// shin du gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i lam/ gnad du snun nas tshe cig 'di nyid la// sgrub pa'i sa mnyes rnal 'byor bcu phrag brgyad/ zhabs rdul dri med gus pas gtsug tu blang / sgrub pa sgrub pa'i mchog gyur gru grub mgon// yon tan yon tan kun ldan 'phags pa lta/ 
x1b8(brgyad stong): 'phags pa 'phags pa'i mchog gyur thogs med zhubs// mkhas pa mkhas pa'i mchog gyur dbyig gi gnyen/ rtsod pa rtsod las rgyal ba phyogs kyi blang // grags pa grags pa'i dpal mnga' chos kyi grags/ 'dzam gling nyin mor byed pa'i brgyan drug go// bcos min dad pa bstan pos gtsug
x1b9(brgyad stong): mchod// btsun pa btsun pa'i mchog gyur yon tan 'a // bzang po bzang po'i mchog gyur dul ba lha// 'dzam gling bstan pa'i srog shing mchog gnyis po// go gsum dang ba'i go nas gtsug gi mchod// kye// gsan dang bsten la mngon dga' dag/ byaskal bzang 'di la sangs rgyas
x1b10(brgyad stong): stong byon te// 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub 'od srungs 'das/ snyigs mo'i dus 'dir thub pa'i dbang po byon/ de la thub bstan lo ni lnga stong dang // bzhi bcu zhe dgu gnas par mkhas rnams bzhed/ yang cig gsan dang bod kyi blo can rnams te/ lo ni lnga brgya phrag bdun lon pa'i che// 'phags/ 
x1b11(brgyad stong): yul byang phyogs kha ba can ljongs 'di'o// phan pa de'i 'od 'bar bsnyen pa'i nyi ma shar/ ma rig mun pa'i tshogs kun bcom pa lags// mkhyen brtse'i mdangs sgro 'od dkar zla ba ni/ bar ri mthon po'i phrag pa la mdzes nas// phan pa dre'i kun daphyogs bcur rgyas mdzad pa/ skyes mchog lo pa r+Na
x1b12(brgyad stong): rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// 'byam dbyangs 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzim/ sna tshogs 'gro ba thabs kyi 'dul slad du/ srong ba tsan rgam po kri srong ral pa can/ rgyal po'i skur skon chos kyi sgra sgrogs ma khan/ mu tig phreng ltar spel legs byon la 'dud/ rgyal ba'i gsung bya
x2a1(brgyad stong): legs pa'i gsung 'bras gang / gang gis gsung dbyangs dbyangs can ji bzhin spyan// stan grags sgrags pa'i rgyal mtshan g.yon mtho/ grub pa'i mchog stes rtse ba'i bla ma mchod// e ma ho// bstan pa'i nyi ma 'gro ba'i blo mu na sel// 'gro kun sgrol
x2a2(brgyad stong): ba'i lam bzang ston na mkhas// mkhas mang nang na 'dran zla kun bral ba'i// rab gnas mkhan po mkhan chen rdo rje rgyal mtshan spyi bos mchod// kha bslab gsum rnam dag tshul khrims rgyan gyi mdzes// gzhonu nyid nas dam pa'i chos dang 'jal// nyes lhung dri mas ma gos
x2a3(brgyad stong): btsun pa'i mchog/ shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje rnam bu gnyis la mchod/ kye mi dbang dbus na mngon par che mtho zhing / khrims gtsad nas lugs gnyis skyong na mkhas/ phyi rol dgra las rnam par rgyal gyur pa'i// bar nub rgyal rgyud cag tu rgyal gyur cig/ kye de yis migs
x2a4(brgyad stong): sbyangs rol phyogs gru bzhi yis// mchog tu gyur pa d+ha ra bu gzhung gi mgo yul la g.yang chags stag kyus gzhung gi dbus/ 'bur du sdod pa bkra shis par gling der/ mi rigs khungs btsun pa chen rgyal rgyud lags// kyi/ skyes pa'i po lha grags pa'i spyan pa can// snyan pa'i
x2a5(brgyad stong): ba dan phyogs bcur grags pa yis// 'byor pa rnam thos bu yis dpal dang ldan/ yon gyi bdag po mgon po khyed la stod// phun tshogs 'dod gu'i lo 'dab rab tu bstan// dpal 'byor 'dab rgyas 'byor pa'i ga bog sgo rgyas// yab mes bzang po'i rgyud pa mu tig 'dzin/ yon gyi bdag
x2a6(brgyad stong): bo blos dpal zang bstod// rnam mang dge legs kun gyi yid 'phrog pI/ lha bu gzhonu mi la 'phos 'dra ba/ yon bdag po sri rar dang ni sra bstan rdo rje gnyis la bstod// dpa' chen lta bur phyi rol dgra rnams 'dul// mdzangs drung ldan pas nye 'khor mtha' nas skyong // rnam rig bkra bas gong ma'i
x2a7(brgyad stong): spyan mngar mdzes// tsher gtso'i mchog gyur bu chung dpal zung dang ni na mkhye' yab sras rnams la bstod// dpal 'byor ldan pas dkar po'i dge la mos// yon gyi bdag po pa la 'bar sku mched bzhi la bstod// bsod nams dbus na dad pa'i sde dpon rgyas// nye nas bsam me dang ni namakha' gnyis
x2a8(brgyad stong): la bstod// dpal 'byor gshog sgo rgyas pa'i mgrin pa mtho/ gyos po'i mchog gyur dkog rin chen dang ni tshe bstan gnyis la bstod// bsod nams dpal 'byor 'jom po'i dbus na mdzes// mag pa'i mchog gyur tshe skyabs grol ma dang ni bstan pa gnyis la bstod// rnam skyod gtsang bas dkar ba'i
x2a9(brgyad stong): dge la mos// tsha bo'i mchog gyur dpal 'bar sku mched rnams dang / srang gyur sku mched rnams la bstod// 'byor pa'i 'dab rgyas dpal 'byor phun tshogs rgyas// kung po'i mchog gyur nor bu sku mched dang ni blo gros sku mched bstod// rnam rig btsang bas dge la mos pa bskyed// zhang po'i mchog gyur
x2a10(brgyad stong): namakha' skyab ma sku mched bstod// 'bye ba chen khong khrol dgra g.yag cham la 'bebasad+ha tshag pa'i mchog gyur bu chung cho skyong dang ni bsam grub rdo rje gnyis la bstod// kyai/ lha mo'i lus la klu mo'i gtsang sbra can/ zas rnams bdud rtsir sbyor ba'i g.yang mo che/ gang zhag dor spel lha mo no
x2a11(brgyad stong): rgyun 'dra/ yon gyi bdag mo dpal khrid dang ni cho ge gnyis la bya ba lags// yid bzhin nor bu ltar du dgos 'dir 'gru ba// dang btson ldan pas dkog mchod la brtsom/ yas 'phro sad pas mchod gnas mnyes par mdzad// yon gyi bdag mo ming 'dzem dang ni kyi 'dzul gnyis la bya ba lags/ 
x2a12(brgyad stong): me tog padra ltar du skye tshul legs/ yon gyi 'dag mos gyu la 'am dang \u0f88\u0f90 ne u na lus la rang ba'i ni ldan ma/ yon gyi bdag ste ma la bya ba lags / pa bang bu mo mdzangs ma 'thul gyi rigs yon gyi bdag mo tsho ngas dnga' mo dang ni sbyar bu bya ba lag so rnam byang ldan pas ng+ge
x2b1(brgyad stong): po'i dge la mos// sring mo'i mchog gyur dpal khrid dngade rgya ne dang ni bsam me gsum la bya ba lags// ne btsun lus la dad pa'i zhing ldan ma/ a ne ming khrid dang ni bsam grub dang // dpal 'dren ming 'dzom ku tsan dka' 'dzom dang lnga la bya ba legs// dkon
x2b2(brgyad stong): mchog mchod la brtson pa'i sems bskyed ma/ phyug mo'i mchog gyur lha mo dang ni dpal 'dren gnyis la bya ba lags// ta la'i me tog lta bur kha dog legs/ tsha mo'i mchog gyur tshe rings dpal 'dren dang ni bu khrid dang / bu khrid dang ni 'dzom me
x2b3(brgyad stong): bzhi la bya ba lags// lha phran lta bur kun gyi mig mngar mdzes// snying mo'i mchog gyur sum chog dang ni tshe rengs spyan rnams bya ba lags// kyi de ltar gyur pa'i sbyin bdag 'khor bcas kyis/ bka' bros dam pa'i chos la legs sbyar nas/ tra sgyu ma
x2b4(brgyad stong): nor la snying po blang phyir du/ 8bka'i snying po 'phags pa brgyad stong dang / u rgyan pad+ma'i gu ru le khA zhengs/ 'di bzhengs dge ba'i bsod nams mthus/ sku tshe ring zhing bstan pa dang / dpal dang 'byor pa rgyas pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa ro shog/ 
x2b5(brgyad stong): e ma ho/ 'jam dbyangs gser mdog can la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon dus mkhas pa khyung po g.yu khI dang / bar du mkhas pa skal dang sum pa dang / ding sang mkhas pa yab mes zhabs la 'dud/ ring sang dus kyi glegs bam khyad 'phags
x2b6(brgyad stong): 'di// stod na rgya skad nyi mo shar 'dra dang / bar nA khwa gong zla ba tsan tshes 'dra dang // smad na rgyu sa yig mu tig star la rgyus 'dra 'di/ mkhas pa'i rgyud 'dzin ma nor ba'i// lha mgon kun ka gnyis kyi legs par bsgrubs// 
x2b7(brgyad stong): gzhan yang bcus don/ 'degs byed lag len byed mi rnams/ 'di phyi kun du 'dod dgu 'byung bar shog/ mi 'gyur lhun po sku'i bkra shis shog/ yan lag drug bcu gsung gi bkra shis shig/ mtha' bral don rtogs thugs kyi bkra shis shog/ rgyal
x2b8(brgyad stong): ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi bkra shis sho ga/ sku che'i bo bzhin du bstan par shog/ snyan grags na mkha' lta bur khyab par shog/ brgyud sde nyi zla bzhin du gsal ba ra shog/ mi nor zas gsum 'dzom pa'i bkra shis shog// mang+ga la~M// 
x3a1(brgyad stong): oM swa sti sid d+haM/ phyogs thams cad du bkra shis dang bde legs kyi sgrub por gyur ceg/ rgyud lu'aman ngag rtogs pa'i namaldan la/ mkhyen rtogs phun tshogs dpal gyi nyi ma shwar/ thugs rje'i zer gyis ma rig mun pa sel// dang ldan bla ma'i tshe gas
x3a2(brgyad stong): la gus phyag 'tshal// gang gis byams pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mnyam par gzhag po'i skad cig la// sto bos ldan bdud kyi dpa'o rnams// 'jom mdzad thu bo pa'i dbang po mchog/ spros med shes rab pha rol phyin// chos dbyings nam kha'i ngo bo nyid// rgyal ba thams
x3a3(brgyad stong): cad bskyed pa'i yum// yum chen sher phyin la phyag 'tshal// za ba bzhi spros bral 'dus ma byas/ gang gis rgyud la rab sbyar nas// thog ma bai rar+ya dang mthar dge bo// dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshalo// 'gro ba'i bsags sbyangs mchog gri zhing // dri med slab gsum tshu lo
x3a4(brgyad stong): na po// nyan thos rang rgyal dgra bcom pa'i// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal// kyai rka gnas la khyad 'phags bya rgod phung po der// bsten pa'i bdag po bcom ldan shA ka thub kyis// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong go nyen po ru// chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi slong gsung so// 
x3a5(brgyad stong): 'o srungs nye ba 'khor dang kun dga' bos// bka'i bsku ba rab 'bring gsum du mdzad// lo paN mkhas pas rgya nas bod du sbyar// mes dben rnam gsum rgyal po'i sku ring la// dbu snyengs srol sdong dar zhing rgyas par mdzad// ny+tsi dzA lha bu'i lo pa Na rnams la 'dung // rgya chen mkhyen pa'i namu kha
x3a6(brgyad stong): yangs pa la/ rtse ba'i thugs rjes dkyil 'khor rab rgyas te// mdzad pa'i phrini las tsha zer sdong 'phro ba/ rab gnas mkhan po mkhan chen dge 'dun gus pas mched// / gyon nu rab byung tshal khrims rgyan khrid can/ slab gsum bum pa chab kyis legs lham pa'i// dur mig 'dzin pa'i
x3a7(brgyad stong): bshes bsnyen mchog gyur pa// shAkya'i dge slong kun dga' dpal 'byor dang / dge slong ji dang ni/ drag dmar dge slong rnams la mchod// kyai/ rlung me chu dang rin chen sa gzhi'i steng / rta bdun rgyu skar dbang po 'khregs pa'i 'og/ 'dzam bu gling dbus rdo rje ga dan gyi bya // 
x3a8(brgyad stong): gas ldan gnas pa sham b+ha la'i nub// chu bro napag shu dal gyis 'bab pa'i lho// mkha 'gro gnas pa u rgyan yul gyi shar// dgra bcom gnas pa ti se gangs kyi mgul// ma gros gnas pa ma spang mtsho'i dbus// kun 'du kun 'jom rgya la sa chen po der// rgya phrag
x3a9(brgyad stong): dpal 'byor 'du ba'i mi dbang mchogr-it+ta shar+ya nub rgyal po rtag tu rgyal gyur cig// kyai/ de'i chab srid logs par sbyangs pa yis// lce ru chags pa rta rapa gru'i mgo// sa la 'bur sdod rtag kyis par gling 'dir// mi rigs khungs btsun pa chen rgya la rgyud yin// gzhan
x3a10(brgyad stong): la dri mi gos pa'i mi rigs lags// kye bstan pa'i chos sgor bzhugs nas rab tu byung // dge sbyong sra brtan rdo di la bstod// kyai blo ldan shes rab gsal ba'i tsho dpon ni// dpa' rtsal ldan pa'i phyi'i dgra rnams 'dul// mdzangs drung ldan pas nang gi snyen rnams skyong // bu chung
x3a11(brgyad stong): yab sras rnams la mngon par bstod// kyai/ snga pa tshogs bsags che 'dir dpal 'byor 'dzom// dkon mchog mchod la rab tu spro ba la// sbyin bdag mdzad bzang lha mi 'di 'dra ba// yon gyi bdag po blo gros dpal bzang bstod// skyes pa'i pho la grags pa'i sman pa/ 
x3a12(brgyad stong): can// blo gros yon tan da ma'i grags pa yis// yon gyi bdag po 'gon po nyid la bstod// shes rig gsal bas nye drung kun dang mthun// rnam dpyod ldan pas dkar po dge la mos// yon gyi bdag po sri dar khyed la bstod// lha bu mo'i yul da bab pa 'dra// yin gyi
x3b1(brgyad stong): po kAn dga'u lhan grub bstod// dang rtson che bas dkar po dge la mos// dkon mchog mchod pas mchod gnas bsnyes por mdzad// yon gyi bdag po rdo rje dpal 'bar sku mched yab sras rnams la bstod// bsod nams rgya mtsho'i dbus na lgang ba// bsam me la sogs
x3b2(brgyad stong): pha tshan rnams la bstod// kyai/ rnam dpyod ldan pas kun gyi thugs la mdzes// 'dzangs drung ldan pas nye ring kun dang mthun// gyos po'i mchog gyur na mkha' dar dang tshe skyabs sgrol ma gnyis la bstod// ji ltar sngon gyi mdzad pa ji bzhin du// dad pa che bas dkar po'i dge la
x3b3(brgyad stong): mos// tsha bo'i mchog gyur dpal 'bar sku mched rnams dang / srang kyur sku mched gnyis la bstod// dal 'byor legs par theb pa'i dpag bsam rgyas// yon gyi bstan pa yab sras rnams la bstod// bya ba'i 'du byed gzhan pas lhag par ston// mag pa'i mchog gyur
x4b1(brgyad stong): oM sasti sid d+haM/ mig sngar rab mdzes mdzes pa'i sku byad dang / rna bar gang mdzes mdzes pa'i gsung dbyangs dang // yid la gang mdzes mdzes pa'i thugs blo cam/ kun mkhyen mkhyen pa'i dbang po deng 'dir rgyal// de gsung gsung gi bdud rtsi mtshar du dang ra/ 
x4b2(brgyad stong): rabu myangs myangs pa'i mdo la tshang rdungs sel// legs lam lam gyi mchog gyur lung rtogs chos// dam chos chos kyi dga' ston rgyas gyur cig/ dge legs legs pa'i lam lnga rab bsten te/ rab dga' dga' ba'i sa sogs nyer dring nas// rnam mang mang po'i mgon
x4b3(brgyad stong): gyur dge ba'i bshes// 'phags tshogs tshogs kyi mchog gyur dge 'dun rgyal// rtsa tshad med thugs rje'i lcags kyu gcig gis kyang // 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'gro ba kun bzung nas// rnam grol byang chub skam sar 'dren mdzad pa// yum chen pha rol phyin ma khyod yin no// 
x4b4(brgyad stong): zag med mngal phyin rgyal sras slob mar bcas// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas mu ming na/ dpag med 'gro ba'i don du su zhugs pa// bla med sras kyi tshogs la phyag bgyi'o// mkhyen ldan thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdud las rgyal// rgyal ba'i rgyal tshab rgyal sras
x4b5(brgyad stong): ming mo mgon// mgon de'i zhal gzigs 'phags pa thogs med zhabs// zhabs bzung gus sten mkhas mchog dbyig gi gnyen/ gnyen gyur thugs mnga' 'phags pa rnam grol+la sde/ de sogs par phyin brgyud pa'i bla ma mchod// sangs rgyas stong gi yab gyur snangab/ 
x4b6(brgyad stong): mthal/ mtha' yas 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten dbang // dbang 'byor sna tshogs skur ston srong btsan rgam// rgam po'i skyod mdzad klu grub pad+ma rder// rdo rje'i sku mnyes sgrub chen dngos zhabs// de sogs 'gro 'dul brgyud pa'i bla ma mchod// kun mkhyen mkhyen pa'i dbang po/ 
x4b7(brgyad stong): 'jam pa'i dbyangs// thugs rje rje btsun dam pa spyan ras gzigs// mthu stobs stobs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin// rigs gsum rigs kyi mgon po rtag tu rgyal// shin du gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i lam// gnang du snun nas tshe gcig 'di nyid la// sgrub pa'i sa mnyes
x4b8(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor bcu phrag brgya pa// zhabs rdul dri med gus pas gtsug tu blang // sgrub pa sgrub pa'i mchog gyur glu grub mgon// yon tan yon kun ldan 'phags pa lha// 'phags pa 'phags pa'i mchog gyur thogs med zhabs// mkhas pa mkhas pa'i mchog gyur
x4b9(brgyad stong): dbyig gi gnyin// rtsod pa rtsod las rgyal ba phyogs kyi bla / grags pa grags pa'i dpal mnga' chos kyi grags// 'dzam gling nyin mor byed pa'i brgyan drug po// bcos min dad pa bstan pos gtsug tu mchod// btsun pa btsun pa'i mchog gyur yon tan 'od// bzang po
x4b10(brgyad stong): bzang po'i mchog gyur dul ba lha// 'dzam gling bstan pa'i srog shing mchog gnyis po// go gsum dang ba'i go nas gtsug gi mchod// kyai// gsan dang bstan la mngon dga' dag/ bskal bzang 'di la sangs rgyas stong byon te// 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub 'od srungs
x4b11(brgyad stong): 'das// snyigs ma'i dus 'dir thub pa'i dbang po byon// de la thub bstan lo ni lnga stong dang // bzhi bcu zhe dgu gnas par mkhas rnams bzhed// yang cig gsan dang bod kyi blo can rnams// lo ni lnga brgya phrag bdun lon pa'i tshe// 'phags yul byang phyogs kha ba can ljos
x5a1(brgyad stong): 'dir/ phan pa de'i 'od 'bar bstan pa'i nyi ma shar// ma rig mun pa'i tshogs kun bcom pa lags// mkhyen brtse'i mdangs sgro 'od dkar zla ba ni// shar ri mthon po'i phrag pa la mdzes nus// phan pa de'i kun da phyogs bcur rgyas mdzad pa// skyes mchog lo// 
x5a2(brgyad stong): paN rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'jam dbyangs 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin// sna tshogs 'gro ba thabs kyis 'dul slad du// slong btsan rgam po khri srong ral pa can// rgyal po'i skur ston chos kyi sgra sgrogs mkhan// mu tig phreng ltar spel legs byon la 'dud/ 
x5a3(brgyad stong): rgyal ba'i gsung legs legs pa'i gsung rabs gang // gang gis gsung dbyangs dbyangs can ji bzhin snyan// snyan grags grags pa'i rgyal mtshan g.yon mtho// grub pa'i sa snyes bsod nams lhun grub mchod// e ma ho// sde snod gsum gyi sku mchog dri med la/ 
x5a4(brgyad stong): rgyud sde bzhi yi gsung dbyangs phyogs bcur sgrogs// nges don stong nyid don rtogs rdo rje'i thugs// mtshungs med chos skyabs dpal bzang gtsug gis mchod// bstan pa'i nyi ma 'gro ba'i blo mun sel// 'gro kun sgrol ba'i lam bzang ston na mkhas// mkhas mang
x5a5(brgyad stong): nang na 'dran zla kun bral ba'i// mkhan rlung sgrol ma chos dbang gus pas mchod// rta bslab gsum yongs rdzogs sgra tshad don la mkhas// nang rig nges don rtogs pa phul du phyin// nyes ltung dri mis ma gos btsun pa'i mchog/ rab gnas mkhan ched pad+ma ma spyi 'os mchod// 
x5a6(brgyad stong): kyai/ mi dbang dbus na mngon par che mtho zhing // khrims gtsang nang nas lugs gnyis skyong na mkhas// phyi rol dgra las rnam par rgyal gyur pa'i// smon thang gdung rgyud dri med rgyal gyur cig/ Ni kyai// de yis legs sbyangs drol phyogs kyu/ 
x5a7(brgyad stong): bzhi yis// mchog tu gyur pa rtswa rab gzhung gi bstod// yul la g.yang chags stag skyes gzhung gi dbus// sa la 'bur sdong rtag kyus bar ma der// mi rigs khungs btsun pa chen rgyal rgyud lags// kye ho// skyes pa'i pho la grags
x5a8(brgyad stong): snyan pa'i can// snyan pa'i ba dan phyogs bcur grogs pa yi sA// 'byor pa rnam thos bu yis dpal dang ldan// yon gyi dag po tshul khrim nyid la stod// phun+da tshogs 'dod gu'i lo 'dra ba rab tu bstan// 'byor pa'i
x5a9(brgyad stong): 'dab rgyas dpal 'byor gshog sgo rgyas// ya ba mes bzang ba'i rgyud ba mu tig 'dzin// yon gyi bdag po sr-i dar dpal la bstodade// rnam mang dge legs kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// yon gyi dag po srang mo bya ba lags// 
x5a10(brgyad stong): me tog pad+ma ltar du skye tshul lags// yon gyi bdag po srang snyed bya ba lpags// lta bu bzho nu mi la 'phos 'dra ba// kun dga' bkra shIs bya re lags// kyeho'o// dpa' rtsal rje bas byi yis gra rnam 'dul// 'dzangs drung ldan
x5a11(brgyad stong): pas nye 'khor skyong la mkhas// dpal 'byor ldan pas dkar po'i dge la brtson// tsher bco'i mchog gyur bu chung ljang dor nyid lnga stod// bsod nams dbus na dad pa'i sde dpon rgyas// dpal 'byor gshog sgo rgyas pa'i
x5b1(brgyad stong): skyon byam // ma ga tu rlung brnyed mas dang / kun du smra g+sa sma du ste/ gro sa bstunas sa logs/ sod nams dpal 'acor 'dzum pa'i dadus na mdzes/ sa sto ma
x5b2(brgyad stong): zur kon b+ha ba lags// sA phran mi la 'phos 'dru bas// keng po'i mchog gyur tshe rings legs pa// spun gnyis dang ni lhun grub bya ba lags// rnam spyod gtsang bas dkar po'i dpe la mos// nye
x5b3(brgyad stong): mchog gyur 'phan po pha bu rnam la mngon par stod/ kyai ho// ne btsun las la bstan pa'i gor zhugs nas// las 'phro tshad pas sangs rgyas bstan dang 'jol// bstan pa'i rjes 'dzin rab tu glod pa yis// 
x5b4(brgyad stong): klub bram bsod nams dpal 'dren bya ba lags/ lha mo'i lus la k+Sha mo'i gtsang ste can// zas rnam bdud rtser sbyor ba'i bcing sbra can// yon gyi bdas mo kyi 'dzul byab lags// srid bzhin nor nu la
x5b5(brgyad stong): du dgos 'dod 'grug/ yon gyi dag mo dpal 'dren rnam gnyis bya ba lags// lha phran lta bur kun gyi spyan la mdzes// pA la grid dang na rgya ne bya ba laT/ bzangs bu mo mdzangs ma 'khrul cigyi riT// yon gyi dag mo bu ShI kyi'i laT/ 
x5b6(brgyad stong): dkon mchog mchod la 'dun skems skyed ma// snying mo'i de mchog gyur dpal ldan lham dang dpal mo bya ba lags// ni btsun lus la dad pa'i bzhi ldan ma// nur bu dang ni 'dzem pa bya ba lags// lha mo'i mu bo ni bzang marnas
x5b7(brgyad stong): sa nr-i dud cir skyer ba'i yor dag ma// tshong lha dang mi rdzas pa su 'dren phyog pa bya ba la na// kye// 'jam dbyangs dag ser mdog can la phyag 'tsha lo// sngon dus mkhas pa khrung po g.yu khri dang / bar du mkhas pa sba la dang suM pa dang // ding sang mkhas pa yab
x5b8(brgyad stong): mes gong ma'i zhabs la 'dud// dang sang dus kyi phre Ta ba khyud par can// stod+ha rgya skad nye shar 'dra dang / ba ran kha ker zla tsan chos 'dra dang / sma na rgyas yig mu tig star la rgyus 'dra 'dri// skyab ma legs pa gnyis kyis// skabs/ 
x5b9(brgyad stong): gser gsum dang / nganam myang chung bringamaches cing/ nan pa mang snga mar dus rnams// min tshang pa sa sos// mi gyur gyu pa ts+li migog/ ya lagatug su sa shog mas ca ga na
3a1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rangs des rgyas thams cad
3a2(brgyad stong): ngag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
3b1(brgyad stong): na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ dge slong
3b2(brgyad stong): stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs gcig go// thams
3b3(brgyad stong): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems
3b4(brgyad stong): shin du rnam par gol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par gol ba/ cang shes pa/ gang
4a1(brgyad stong): po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor grwa/ rang gi don rjes su rjong
4a2(brgyad stong): pa/ srid pa kun du sbyor ba/ yongs su thod pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin
4a3(brgyad stong): du rnam par grol po/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag ste/ 
4a4(brgyad stong): gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ de nas
4b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
4b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brtsams te/ ji ltar byang chub sems
4b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin
4b4(brgyad stong): khyod spobs par byos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ ci tshe dang ldan pa rang
4b5(brgyad stong): byor 'di bdag nyid kyi rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs
5a1(brgyad stong): 'i stobs byin gyis brlabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyin
5a2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ram/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus yin snyam mo// de nas
5a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i de lta bu'i tshul gyi sems
5a4(brgyad stong): kyi rtog pa de sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
5a5(brgyad stong): shA ri'i ba bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra bo dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / brjod
5b1(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes
5b2(brgyad stong): bu'i mthu yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa'i chos bstan pa de la slob
5b3(brgyad stong): ni/ de bzhin du de dag gis chos nyid de mngon sum du byas nas 'dzin to// de dag gis chos nyid de mngon sum du byas shing
5b4(brgyad stong): bzung nas gang dang gang 'chad pa dang / gang dang gang ston pa dang / gang dang gang nye bar ston pa dang / gang dang gang brjod par
5b5(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / gang dang gang gsal bar byed pa dang / gang dang gang yang dag par gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad chos nyid
5b6(brgyad stong): dong mi 'gal ba yin no// tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu de dag 'di ltar chos nyid de nye bar ston pa rnams chos nyid dang mi 'gal
6a1(brgyad stong): ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab
6a2(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rab 'byor byang chub sems
6a3(brgyad stong): dpo' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las brtsams te/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sos
6a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod slebs par byos shig
6a5(brgyad stong): ces bka' bstsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes brjod pa gang lags pa de la bcom ldan
6a6(brgyad stong): 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang
6b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
6b2(brgyad stong): zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'am byang chub sems dpa'i
6b3(brgyad stong): chos kyang bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang ma 'tshal mi dmigs yang dag
6b4(brgyad stong): par rjes su ma mthong na// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan
6b5(brgyad stong): 'das 'on kyang yang gal te 'di ltar smras pa dang / bstan pa dang nye bar bston pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi
6b6(brgyad stong): 'gong kun du mi zhum bag mi tsha/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ 
6b7(brgyad stong): mi dngang kun du mi sgeg/ kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
7a1(brgyad stong): na sa sa smra stan par gas so// da nga chubs mas dang 'a sems ba
7a2(brgyad stong): babye'o// 'din shes rad k+Shi pa rol du smyon pa la gang mas pa lags kye+e gal te snar gnas nA de 'di 'dri'i gladams po dang sa su bsnun pa la
7a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gnan yong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed cing / shes rang kyi pa'i ma du byin pa
7a4(brgyad stong): bA'i ltar bslabs na/ 'di byang chub kyi sems des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid pa de ltar bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du nono// 'di ltar sem
7a5(brgyad stong): ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'dugs lwa ba la gas so// de nas med du ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di ska
7a6(brgyad stong): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yong ci sems grang sems med pa'i sems de sring dam/ de snyed ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor phyi
7a7(brgyad stong): deng ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'dzind ces smras so// me dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang kyisems med pa nyid gang yin pa'i sems med pa nyid dol yong pa
7b1(brgyad stong): nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par yang 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang / 
7b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la yod pa 'am med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa de/ 
7b3(brgyad stong): sems yod dam/ zhes smras pa'i khyod kyis brgal ba gang yin pa de ci rigs par 'gyur ram/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang / 
7b4(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smos so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa nyid de yang gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
7b5(brgyad stong): sems med po de ni 'gyur ba med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 
7b6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar yang khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ji ltar ston pa legaso leg so// / 
7b7(brgyad stong): de bas na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par nye bar brtag par bya'o// 
8a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar yang rig par bya'o// nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas
8a2(brgyad stong): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha
8a3(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan
8a4(brgyad stong): par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub por bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du
8a5(brgyad stong): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i so la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klog par bya/ kun chub
8a6(brgyad stong): par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la slab par thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad thob par bya ba
8a7(brgyad stong): phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslabs shing rnal 'byor du bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos thad
8b1(brgyad stong): rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid las bstan to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du
8b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la thas
8b3(brgyad stong): mkhas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid las ni
8b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rnal 'byor du bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyas par bstan to// de nas bco
8b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang lags pa 'di nyid bdag gis ma 'tshal
8b6(brgyad stong): ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
8b7(brgyad stong): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di nyid ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs
9a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom
9a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gang dag gis dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ ming tsam gyis 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'du ba dang
9a3(brgyad stong): 'god par bgyid pa ni bdag gi glo ba la gcags lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang ming de yang gnas pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma legs
9a4(brgyad stong): la/ gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ltar ming
9a5(brgyad stong): de gnas pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa yang me legs so// btso
9a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
9a7(brgyad stong): po'i sems mi 'gong kun du mi zhum bag mi tsha/ bgo 'khums par mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ btsom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang / 
9b1(brgyad stong): kun du mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing / lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
9b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// phyir mi ldog par byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa lagaso// 
9b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsgom pas/ 
9b4(brgyad stong): gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams la ma lags/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par
9b5(brgyad stong): mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gzugs la gnas na gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de bzhin
9b6(brgyad stong): du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la gnas na rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
9b7(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol
10a1(brgyad stong): du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa yang ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa yang ma lags so// shes rab kyi
10a2(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs por ma gyur na yongs su bzung ba yongs su bzung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du na
10a3(brgyad stong): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gzugs yongasu gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
10a4(brgyad stong): dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba ma mchi so// gzugs yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba gong lags
10a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'du shes gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lag
10a6(brgyad stong): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang yongasu gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la
10a7(brgyad stong): spyad par bgyi'o// 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tham pod yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ yangs pa mdun du bgyis
10b1(brgyad stong): pa tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongasu gzung ba ma mchis te/ mtshan
10b2(brgyad stong): mar gzung ba ma lag so// gal te mtshan mar gzung bar gyur na kun du rgyu phreng ba can 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ kun du rgyu phreng ba can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
10b3(brgyad stong): shes 'di la mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes kyis bzhugs so// de zhugs nas kyang gzugaso yongasu mi 'dzin to// de bzhin du tshor ba
10b4(brgyad stong): ma lags/ 'du shes ma lags/ 'du byed rnams mo lags/ rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin to// de la shes pa dga' ba dang / bde bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi/ 
10b5(brgyad stong): mthong ngo // shes pa de nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / shes
10b6(brgyad stong): pa de phyi nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du shes pa de
10b7(brgyad stong): nang gi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin/ shes pa de nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi rol gyi
11a1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par
11a2(brgyad stong): shes pa de las gzhan du yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la kun du rgyu phreng ba can mos so// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la thams cad
11a3(brgyad stong): du dad pas rjesu 'brang zhing chos tshad mar bgyis te 'di ltar mos pa zhes bgyi'o// de nas chos gang yongs su ma bzung ngo // gang gzung ba 'am btang bar bgyi ba'i chos de
11a4(brgyad stong): gang yang ma dmigs so// de mya ngan las 'das par yang rlom semasu mi bgyod do// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
11a5(brgyad stong): rol du phyin par rig par bgyi ste/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin/ de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yongs su mi
11a6(brgyad stong): 'dzin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnams yod
11a7(brgyad stong): rdzogs par bar ma der yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ba ste/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi/ 
11b1(brgyad stong): phyin par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol
11b2(brgyad stong): du phyin pa la bsgom pas 'di ltar nye bar rtag cing 'di ltar nges par bsam par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
11b3(brgyad stong): 'di gang gi yin/ ci chos gang med pa dang mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yin nam zhes/ gal te de ltar nye bar brtags de ltar nges par bsems
11b4(brgyad stong): nanami 'gong kun du mi zhum bag mi tsha/ brag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun
11b5(brgyad stong): du mi skrag kun du sgeg pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// 
11b6(brgyad stong): dri nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar glang gi tshe gzugs nyid/ gzugs kyi ngo bo
11b7(brgyad stong): nyid kyang bral ba/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed rnams nyid dang / de bzhin du 'di ltar gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
12a1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ gang
12a2(brgyad stong): gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
12a3(brgyad stong): du phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
12a4(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed rnams nyid dang / 
12a5(brgyad stong): dri bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang
12a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab
12a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang yang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i ngo bo nyid
12b1(brgyad stong): dang yang bral ba'o// ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
12b2(brgyad stong): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar/ 
12b3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la
12b4(brgyad stong): slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu chos thams cad ni nges par 'byung ba med cing
12b5(brgyad stong): ma skyes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ro// ci lta ci ltar thos
12b6(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can yongasu smin pa'i phyir/ lus dang sems yongasu dag pa dang mtshan yong su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
12b7(brgyad stong): yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas dang nye bar yang 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
13a1(brgyad stong): la spyod pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin no// gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las brtsams
13a2(brgyad stong): te 'di skad ces smras so// gal te gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi mtshon ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mtshan ma'o skye
13a3(brgyad stong): du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi skye ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi
13a4(brgyad stong): 'jog pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub
13a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na de dmigs pa nyid la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du
13a6(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa
13a7(brgyad stong): mtshan ma'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la spyod na
13b1(brgyad stong): mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag
13b2(brgyad stong): spyod de snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na de dmigs pa nyid la
13b3(brgyad stong): spyod do// gal te yang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du sems
13b4(brgyad stong): ni de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
13b5(brgyad stong): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 
13b6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la mi
13b7(brgyad stong): spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi skyed/ gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod na/ gzugs kyi skye ba la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa
14a1(brgyad stong): la mi spyod/ gzugs stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod bdag spyod do snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o
14a2(brgyad stong): snyam du dmigs pa la mi spyod pa dang / de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ rnam
14a3(brgyad stong): par shes pa'i mtshan ma lo mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la mi spyod/ rnam par
14a4(brgyad stong): shes pa'i 'jig pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag spyod de snyam du mi skyed/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub
14a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa'o snyam du dmigs pa la mi spyod cing / gal te yang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar skyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
14a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du mi sems pa ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// 
14a7(brgyad stong): de ltar spyod kyang spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ mi skyed do snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi skyed do snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyod pa yang ma yin la mi
14b1(brgyad stong): spyod pa yang ma yin no snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par mi bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par bya ba yang ma yin la/ spyad par mi/ 
14b2(brgyad stong): bye ba yang ma yin no snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par bya ba yang ma yin la spyad par mi bya ba yang ma yin pa nyid do snyam du nye bar mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thaMd ni nye
14b3(brgyad stong): bor ma rtogs shing ma zin pas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad len pa med pa zhes bya ba ste/ yangs pa mdun du
14b4(brgyad stong): byas pa tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14b5(brgyad stong): chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
14b6(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
14b7(brgyad stong): dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags so// de ni ting nge 'dzin de yang
15a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid/ bdag ni mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
15a2(brgyad stong): 'jug go// bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhug pa'o// bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o snyam pa de lta bu de lnga thams cad nas thams cad rnam
15a3(brgyad stong): pa thams cad du thams cad ma mchis so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
15a4(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang gis gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
15a5(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
15a6(brgyad stong): dbu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu des ni ting nge 'dzini de yang mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
15a7(brgyad stong): 'byor mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ro// de ci'i
15b1(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de med pas na mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang / 
15b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ ji ltar yang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus spobs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ston pa
15b3(brgyad stong): ni rab 'byor logs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni de bzhin du bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
15b4(brgyad stong): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bus 'di/ 
15b5(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ de skad ces
15b6(brgyad stong): gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
15b7(brgyad stong): slob na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa yin no// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// 
16a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na chos gang la slob pa lugs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang / 
16a2(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' bsnol pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni chos gang la yang mi slob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos de
16a3(brgyad stong): dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas ci ltar mngon par chags pa de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on
16a4(brgyad stong): de dag ci ltar mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ci ltar med pa de bzhin du yang dag par yod de de ltar med pa de'i ma rig pa zhes bya'o// de dag la
16a5(brgyad stong): byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams mngon par chags te/ de dag gis chos thams cad med pa la brtags so// de dag gis de la brtags nas mtha' gnyis
16a6(brgyad stong): lo zhen pas chos de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ de'i phyir de dag med bzhin du chos thams cad la rtog go// brtags nas mtha' gnyis la mngon par chags so// mngon par chags
16a7(brgyad stong): pa de'i gzhis dmigs pa la gnas nas 'das pa'i chos la tog go// ma 'ongs pa'i chos la rtog go// da ltar byung ba'i chos la rtog go// de dag gis brtags nas ming dang gcu
16b1(brgyad stong): la mngon par zhen to// de dag gi med pa'i chos de dag thams cad la brtags pas lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes mi mthong ngo // lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
16b2(brgyad stong): ma shes ma mthong bas khams gsum las nges par mi 'byung / yang dag pa'i mtha' khong du mi chud de de'i phyir de dag byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag chos bden
16b3(brgyad stong): pa la yid mi ches so// shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa mi byed do// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang
16b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen
16b5(brgyad stong): pa nyid la slob pa lags same/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
16b6(brgyad stong): slob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob ni chos thams cad la slob po// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slong
16b7(brgyad stong): na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
17a1(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
17a2(brgyad stong): la slob par 'gyur ram/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ram/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ zhes de skad du yongs su 'di na pa
17a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de la ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces rab 'byor de bas na 'dir khyod nyid
17a4(brgyad stong): la 'dri bar bya yis khyod kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du ston cig ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan
17a5(brgyad stong): 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bskul pa dang / rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan nam de
17a6(brgyad stong): bzhin du sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba de gzhan nam 'du shes de gzhan nam/ 'du byed rnams de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems sgyu ma de gzhan la rnam par shes
17a7(brgyad stong): pa de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags te sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid sgyu ma
17b1(brgyad stong): lags so sgyu ma nyid gzugs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba de gzhan dang / 'du shes de gzhan dang / 'du byed rnams de gzhan yang ma lag
17b2(brgyad stong): te/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nams nyid sgyu ma lags so sgyu ma nyid tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu
17b3(brgyad stong): ma de gzhan la rnam par shes pa de gzhan yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shis pa nyid sgyu ma lagaso sgyu ma nyid rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
17b4(brgyad stong): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i 'du shes dang kun shes pa dang
17b5(brgyad stong): rnam par rig pa dang tha snyad 'di yin nam/ de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das de
17b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin te bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa des ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu
17b7(brgyad stong): ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po de dag nyid sgyu ma'i skyes
18a1(brgyad stong): bur gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ gzugs gang lags pa
18a2(brgyad stong): de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga po de dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams sgyu ma lta bur gsungs
18a3(brgyad stong): shing bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa yang sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga po de dag
18a4(brgyad stong): lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bstan pa 'di thos na dngang zhing skrag la/ kun du skrag
18a5(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
18a6(brgyad stong): rnams sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar 'gyur na ni/ dngang zhing kun du skrag la kun du skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs
18a7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar gyur na ni mi dngang kun du mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro// 
18b1(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
18b2(brgyad stong): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang rnams lags par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ gang de dag la pha rol du phyin pa rnams 'doms shing ston
18b3(brgyad stong): pa rnams dang / gang de dag la bdud kyi las rnams nye bar ston pa ste/ bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di lta bur rig par bya/ bdud kyi las ni 'di lta bur rig par bya/ bdud kyi nyes pa
18b4(brgyad stong): ni 'di dag yin/ bdud kyi las ni 'di dag yin par rig par bya/ bdud kyi las 'di dag khyed kyis rtogs nos spang bar bya'o// zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag gi ni
18b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes
18b6(brgyad stong): gau nyen rnams su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi
18b7(brgyad stong): gang 'di skad du rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la
19a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams su rig par bya'o// zhes bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs
19a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po zhes bka' bstsal pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzho'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
19a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi'i don med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa
19a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi chags pa med pa la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rjesu rtogs pa'i don du
19a5(brgyad stong): chags pa med pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub don du gnyer bas na byang chub sems dpa' sos
19a6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' bstsal pa/ 
19a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang seMs
19b1(brgyad stong): can gyi ris chen po'i mchog nyid du bya'o snyam pa ste don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
19b2(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gagong gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar slob so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
19b3(brgyad stong): bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par bgyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / 
19b4(brgyad stong): srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lus la lta ba chen po 'di lta bu la sogs
19b5(brgyad stong): pa'i lte ba de dag spang ba'i slad du chos bstan to// snyam ste/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ra
19b6(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gis slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom
19b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
20a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub kyi sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam pa med pa'i seMs
20a2(brgyad stong): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags yong su
20a3(brgyad stong): ma zin to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni zag pa ma mchis pa yongs su ma zin pa'o// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa ma
20a4(brgyad stong): mchis shing / yongasu ma zin pa gang lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags shing yongasu ma zin te don des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes pa'i gra
20a5(brgyad stong): mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i rgyus sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs
20a6(brgyad stong): ma zin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang ma chags shing yongasu ma zin to// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
20a7(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor yodang ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa de la yod pa 'am med
20b1(brgyad stong): pa dmigs par 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de
20b2(brgyad stong): la gang yod pa 'am/ med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ji ltar 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer/ shA ri'i
20b3(brgyad stong): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar yang khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs legs
20b4(brgyad stong): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes
20b5(brgyad stong): bgyi ba gang lags pa 'didri ni sems dpa' de go cha chen po bgros pa sems dpa' de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas
20b6(brgyad stong): pa lags te/ de'i slad du sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangasu mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
20b7(brgyad stong): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi ba 'di gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
21a1(brgyad stong): po go rgya chen po go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di sa
21a2(brgyad stong): du bdag gis sems can gzhal du med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can grangs med pa yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam la/ 
21a3(brgyad stong): gang gis gang yongasu mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can de dag kyang yod pa ma yin no snyam ste/ des sems can de snyed pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar byed
21a4(brgyad stong): la gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang / gang gis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can yang 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
21a5(brgyad stong): sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa 'am sgyu ma byed pa'i nyi gnas kyis lam po rje'i
21a6(brgyad stong): gzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te mngon par sprul nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de mi sbyong bar byas na/ rab 'byor rdo rje snyam du sems/ de la yang gang
21a7(brgyad stong): gis gang yang gsad pa'am shi ba 'am gshig pa 'am mi snang bar byas pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'ad
21b1(brgyad stong): kyis bka' bsgral pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzlo bar
21b2(brgyad stong): byed de/ gang yongasu mya ngan las bzlas pa dang / gang gis yongasu mya ngan las bzlas par 'gyur ba'i sems can 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin no// gal te byang chub sems
21b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa'i chen po bstan pa 'di thos nas mi dngang kun du mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na 'di tsam gyis rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' se/ 
21b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bcom
21b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni go che ma mchis pa bgos
21b6(brgyad stong): pa lags par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni go cha chen po/ 
21b7(brgyad stong): med par bgos par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas pa rnam par ma gyur pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// sems
22a1(brgyad stong): can gang dag gi don du go cha 'di dgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas pa rnam par ma sbyar ba mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de skad ces bka' bskul pa
22a2(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces bka' gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ de tsa'i
22a3(brgyad stong): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
22a4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings mi grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes
22a5(brgyad stong): kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po
22a6(brgyad stong): byams ma'i bus tshe dang ljon pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
22a7(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
22b1(brgyad stong): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byon
22b2(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'on te gzugs ma gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de
22b3(brgyad stong): gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba de gang yin/ 'du shes de gang yin/ 'du byed rnams de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer
22b4(brgyad stong): bya'i rnam par shes pa de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mA bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de bzhin du
22b5(brgyad stong): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma bcings
22b6(brgyad stong): ma gol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de gong yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu la 'di
22b7(brgyad stong): skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du byed gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba gang
23a1(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna
23a2(brgyad stong): par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin
23a3(brgyad stong): du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam
23a4(brgyad stong): pa ra shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa ma yin pas na ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pas na ma bcings ma grol
23a5(brgyad stong): ba'o// ma skyes pas na ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
23a6(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i go cha chen po'i go cha med pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas
23a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa
23b1(brgyad stong): gyur pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ba'i theg pa chen po de ni gang lags/ theg pa chen po de la ji ltar yang dag
23b2(brgyad stong): par zhugs par rig par bgyi 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa
23b3(brgyad stong): chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ theg
23b4(brgyad stong): pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor
23b5(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dag so// rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du the
23b6(brgyad stong): pa chen po de la ji ltar yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis
23b7(brgyad stong): yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ pha rol du
24a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa rnams kyi sgo nas yang dag par zhugs nas khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi dmigs pa gang yin pas yang dag par zhugs te/ 
24a2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gang nas kyang nges par 'byung ba med/ 
24a3(brgyad stong): gang gis kyang yang dag pa zhugs gang du yang gnas par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur la/ theg pa chen
24a4(brgyad stong): po des gang yang nges par ma phyung nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur nges par phyung ba yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i
24a5(brgyad stong): chos de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa la chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces
24a6(brgyad stong): bka' bsngal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di
24a7(brgyad stong): ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis monan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba la brjod do// nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir de ni theg
24b1(brgyad stong): pa chen po'o// ji ltar na mkha' la sems can gzhal du ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa'i go skabs mchis pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la yang sen
24b2(brgyad stong): gzhal du ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis po'i go skabs mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24b3(brgyad stong): chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// 'di la 'ong ba yang ma mthong 'di 'gro ba yang ma mthong zhing 'di la gnas pa yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar theg pa
24b4(brgyad stong): chen po 'di la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni dus gsum du mnyam pa'o// de bas
24b5(brgyad stong): na theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor leg so legs so// 
24b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' smos
24b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la bslabs pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par gyur to// rjes su thob po rjesu 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
25a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i slad du
25a2(brgyad stong): byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni theg pa chen po bshad par bya bar sems lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
25a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po ston par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ rang
25a4(brgyad stong): 'byor de ni ma yin te rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjesu 'thun par ston to// de skad ces bka' bskul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
25a5(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
25a6(brgyad stong): sngon gyi mthar yang nye b.raro ma rtogs byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar yang nye bar mi rtogs/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su yang nye bar ma rtogs so// nye bar ma rtogs
25a7(brgyad stong): pa de'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs mu mo mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' yang mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nas
25b1(brgyad stong): dang / rnam par shes pa mu mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' mu mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar rtogs te 'di
25b2(brgyad stong): yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar ma rtogs te/ 
25b3(brgyad stong): 'dri yang ma mchis mi dmig so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems drapa'i chos thams cad nus thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi
25b4(brgyad stong): dmigs pas bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di gang la yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi
25b5(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong mi dmigs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos
25b6(brgyad stong): de thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yang drag par rjesu ma mthong zhing ma dmigs na chos gang zhig chos gang gis chos gang la gdams shing rjes su
25b7(brgyad stong): bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mong tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam mo// bcom
26a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi b.ros du phyin pa zhes dbyed 'di sang mi tsam mo// mid de mngon par ma grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das gyur ba dag cag ces / 
26a2(brgyad stong): kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag shin du mngon par mi grung pa bzhin no// de ltar ches thams cad dobro nyid ma mchis pa la gang zhig gtung dum mchis shing mngon par ma
26a3(brgyad stong): pa'i gdugs de gang lags/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams de gang 'gras/ gang zhig gzung du ma mchis shing mngon par mi grub pa'i rnam par shes parje
26a4(brgyad stong): gang 'gis/ de ltar chos de dag thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mtshos pa glang lags bya de ni mngon par mgrub pa lags la/ gang chos thams cad kyi mngon par ma grub
26a5(brgyad stong): gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags te/ de ci shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par ma grub pas mngon par ma grur pa la ci nig gdams shing rje su bstan par duskye
26a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das mngon par mthub pa lus gzhan na chos rnams cad dag/ sangs rgyas kyi chos sam byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam gang byung rgya sri skyed dang
26a7(brgyad stong): dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bshad cing de ltar bstan te de ltar nye bar byistan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dnga'achen po'i sems mi na
26b1(brgyad stong): kun du mi zhum bag mi tsha brag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun du mi skrag kun
26b2(brgyad stong): du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
26b3(brgyad stong): dpe'i chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nye bar rtog pa'o// 
26b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nges par sems dpa'o zhes de ltar rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
26b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chos 'di dag nye bar rtog pa'i tshe/ gzugs nye bar mi rtog gzugs
26b6(brgyad stong): bar mi 'dzin/ gzugs skye bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / gzugs 'grog par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed
26b7(brgyad stong): rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi rtogs/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par shes pa 'gos
27a1(brgyad stong): par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs
27a2(brgyad stong): kyi 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma legs te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyi su
27a3(brgyad stong): bgyir ma mchis so// de nas 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad
27a4(brgyad stong): du gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis pa'i grangasu gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed/ 
27a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye bo ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis
27a6(brgyad stong): pa gang legs pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ des ni skye ba ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyisu bgyir ma
27a7(brgyad stong): mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyis bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du
27b1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis pa'i grangasu gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chos thams cad rnam pa
27b2(brgyad stong): thams cad du nye bar rtog na de'i tshe gzugs nye bar mi rtogs/ gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin/ gzugs skye bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / gzugs 'gag par yang
27b3(brgyad stong): dag par rjes mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi rtag na/ de rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin
