27b4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par rjes mi mthong / rnam par shes pa 'gog par yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba
27b5(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzun
27b6(brgyad stong): ma lags te des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyisu bgyir ma mchis s+ho// des na 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang / 
27b7(brgyad stong): gzugs zhes bgyi bo 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyisu bgyir ma mchis te/ gang 'di skad du gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis pa'i grangs
28a1(brgyad stong): gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam
28a2(brgyad stong): par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma
28a3(brgyad stong): lags te/ des ni skye ba ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang rnam/ 
28a4(brgyad stong): par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis pa'i
28a5(brgyad stong): grangasu gtogs so// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa// / bam po gnyi pa// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
28a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis ji skad smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
28a7(brgyad stong): yang skye ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa spyod pa 'am/ 
28b1(brgyad stong): sems can rnams kyi phyir sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyamasu myong ba'i don du skyo ba yang ci zhig yod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
28b2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu khro bo ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod do// 
28b3(brgyad stong): gang zhig dka' ba'i 'du shes kyi spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dka' bo'i 'du shes bskyed nas ni/ 
28b4(brgyad stong): sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus so// 'on kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nyid du byas nas sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes po dang / phar
28b5(brgyad stong): 'du shes pa dang / byur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes bskyed par byas shing / de bzhin du skyes pa dang / bud med dag la 'du shes de dag byas nas byang chub sems
28b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa
28b7(brgyad stong): dang / phar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par byas te/ ji ltar bdag ni thams cad nas/ 
29a1(brgyad stong): thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad thams cad nas rnam pa thad du/ 
29a2(brgyad stong): thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya'o zhes de ltar sems can thams cad la yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag
29a3(brgyad stong): thams cad yongs su mi btang ngo // bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med pa las thar bar bya'o// bdag gis lus brgyar
29a4(brgyad stong): btubs kyang chung ngu ni 'di dag la bdag gi gnod sems kyang mi bskyed do snyam du/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya'o// 
29a5(brgyad stong): gal te sems de ltar gnas na dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su spyod pa ma yin no// dka' bo byed pa'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i blo gzhan
29a6(brgyad stong): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci nas kyang bdag thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin
29a7(brgyad stong): du chos thams cad thams cad rnam pa thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de ltar sems bskyed par bya zhing de ltar na nang dang phyi'i chos thams cad la 'du shes
29b1(brgyad stong): bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar spyod na dka' ba'i 'du shes can du spyod pa ma yin/ dka' ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
29b2(brgyad stong): gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin no zhes smos pa de ni de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
29b3(brgyad stong): ni skye ba med pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa' nyid skye ba med dam 'on te byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba
29b4(brgyad stong): med rab 'byor gyis skyes pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yod ci bya
29b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i chos rnams khye na skye ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye bo med rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tha~Md mkhyen
29b6(brgyad stong): bo nyid kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na skye ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
29b7(brgyad stong): kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 
30a1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kho na skye ba med dam/ 'on te so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe
30a2(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci so so'i skye bo nyid skye ba med dam/ 'on te so so'i skye bo'i chos
30a3(brgyad stong): rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
30a4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye
30a5(brgyad stong): ba med/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nas
30a6(brgyad stong): kyang skye ba med pa yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thad mkhyen po nyid rje su thob pa yin nam/ de skad ces smras
30a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni ma skyes pa'i chos la thob par mi 'dod la
30b1(brgyad stong): mngon par rtogs par yang ma yin te/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci ma skyes
30b2(brgyad stong): pa'i chos kyis thob pa skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
30b3(brgyad stong): bu yang dri ma skyes pa'i chos skyes pa yin nam/ 'on te ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa nyid yin nam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci skye ba'i chos
30b4(brgyad stong): nyid mi skye ba yin nam/ 'on te mi skye ba'i chos mi skye ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skyo ba'i chos sam mi skye ba'i chos zhes smra bar mi slob so// 
30b5(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyed kyis skye ba med po yang smra bar mi spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skyo ba med pa nyid
30b6(brgyad stong): brjed pa yin la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid so sor snang ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid spobs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
30b7(brgyad stong): de kho na bzhin du shin du so sor snang ba nyid do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan par
31a1(brgyad stong): 'byor ni chos ston pa'i nang na mchog tu bzhag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su
31a2(brgyad stong): dri ba byas pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang
31a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyon thos mi gnas pa'i chos rnams kyi chos
31a4(brgyad stong): nyid ni 'di yin te/ de dag ni gang dang gang nyid la yongasu dri ba byas pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed la chos
31a5(brgyad stong): nyid las kyang mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang tshe sro thams cad mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bus tshe dang ldan
31a6(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor leg so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol
31a7(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid ni theg pa thams cad pa chos thad la mi gnas pa'i phyir/ 
31b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ltar ba/ 
31b2(brgyad stong): cing 'di ltar nye bar bstan pa la sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / nim+ba nur du mi 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems gzhan du mi 'gyur na/ byang chub
31b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnus pa 'das granas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no// zhes rig par bya'o/ 
31b4(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
31b5(brgyad stong): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ci ltar yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba
31b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba yin na/ de ltar na ni de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
31b7(brgyad stong): pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas/ 
32a1(brgyad stong): ga pa dang ma bral na de ltar na ni yid la byed pa de dang mabral bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid/ 
32a2(brgyad stong): la byed pa dang ma bral yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral ba nyid du 'gyur na de lta yin du zin na/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du
32a3(brgyad stong): phyin pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar gnas so// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan
32a4(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu leg so so leg so// 'on kyang khyod la yang klan kar 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa
32a5(brgyad stong): ri'i bus ni don 'di nyid yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod par yongs su gzung ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can ngo bo nyid med pas na yid la byed pa
32a6(brgyad stong): ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pas na yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems
32a7(brgyad stong): can dben pas na yid la byed dben par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pas na yid la byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par
32b1(brgyad stong): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub pas na yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
32b2(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu sems can yang dge par ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas na yid la byed pa yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzon
32b3(brgyad stong): par byang chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i ngo bo yid la byed pa 'di dang gnas pa 'dis gnas par
32b4(brgyad stong): 'dod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong paM las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// / de'i tshe
32b5(brgyad stong): yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi khri dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang
32b6(brgyad stong): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khrir bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu khrir btsas pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu lnga stong yang 'khor
32b7(brgyad stong): de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur te lha rnams kyi rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brji
33a1(brgyad stong): dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis zil gyis mnan to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 24
33a2(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor lha'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor 'dir 'dus te 'khod pa 'di rnams 'phags pa rab 'byor las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes ras
33a3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nye bar bstan pa dang / gdams pa dang rje su bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
33a4(brgyad stong): du phyin pa la gnas par bya/ ci ltar bslab par bya/ ci ltar rnal 'byor du bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi
33a5(brgyad stong): gzi brjid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis nye bar bstan par bya ste/ lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de
33a6(brgyad stong): dag gis sems bskyed par bya'o// gang dag yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal pa
33a7(brgyad stong): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun las mtshams bcad pas de dag yang dang yang du 'khor zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu so/ 
33b1(brgyad stong): bskyed pa'i skal ba med do// 'on kyang gral te de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag la yang rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// kho
33b2(brgyad stong): ni de dag gi dge ba la bar chad mi byed de khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las chos khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o// de nas
33b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' bskul pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sgro/ 
33b4(brgyad stong): ba bskyed pa gang yin pa ni rab 'byor yang khyod kyis legs so// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gas
33b5(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' drin gzo bar bgyi ste bka' drin gzo bar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ji
33b6(brgyad stong): ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid kyis
33b7(brgyad stong): bdag cag rnams kyi don du byang chub kyi phyir tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na/ nyan thos gang dag gos pha rol du phyin pa rnams la gdams shing rje su bstan to// de la nga / 
34a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyi spyad pas bla na med pa'i ye shes bskyed pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
34a2(brgyad stong): rje su yongasu gzung bar bgyi zhing rjes su yongasu bskor bar bgyi'o// yang dag par yongs su gzung bar bgyi zhing yang dag par yongasu bskor bar yang bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
34a3(brgyad stong): na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rje su yongasu yongasu gzung zhing rje su yongasu bskor ba dang yang dag par yongs
34a4(brgyad stong): gzung zhing yang dag par yongasu bskor bas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 
34a5(brgyad stong): gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon lo yid la gzung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
34a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// kau shr-i ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la gnas pas shes rab
34a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya ste/ kau shi ka de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur bar bya'o// gzugs la gnas
34b1(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig la gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs
34b2(brgyad stong): la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
34b3(brgyad stong): ba la gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bya'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos rnams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
34b4(brgyad stong): pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o// sa'i khams la
34b5(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o// dran pa nye ba
34b6(brgyad stong): bzhag pa la gnas par mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam la gnas par mi bya'o// 
34b7(brgyad stong): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par ma bya'o// 
35a1(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na gzugs so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du sheso zhes bya ba dang / 'du
35a2(brgyad stong): byed rnam so zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na rnam par shes pa'on zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar zhes bya ba nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'o zhes bya ba/ 
35a3(brgyad stong): bar du gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na sa'i khams so zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i kham so zhes bya ba'i bar du gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag/ 
35a4(brgyad stong): pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so zhes bya ba dang / 
35a5(brgyad stong): de ltar na lam gyi yan lag go zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
35a6(brgyad stong): bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na dgra bcom pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na sangs rgya so zhes gnas par mi
35a7(brgyad stong): bya'o// gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pas/ 
35b1(brgyad stong): zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
35b2(brgyad stong): pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs stong pa dang mi stong pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed
35b3(brgyad stong): rnams dang rnam par shes pa'o stong pa dang mi stong po'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bdag dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor
35b4(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rna bar shes pa bdag dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// 
35b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs stong pa'o zhes nye bar dmigs
35b6(brgyad stong): pas gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes po'o zhes nye bar dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs/ 
35b7(brgyad stong): pa'i 'bras bu 'das ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
36a1(brgyad stong): bcom pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs/ 
36a2(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rag tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes bya bar gnas po ro mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa de ltar thogs
36a3(brgyad stong): na srid pa la ni bdun pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gan so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yong su mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir
36a4(brgyad stong): 'jig rten 'dir len gcig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnaso zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir
36a5(brgyad stong): mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong ba nyid du yongs mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcomo pa nyid sbyin pa'i gan so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra ba co
36a6(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid du phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnaso
36a7(brgyad stong): zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa ma thob par yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi
36b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis
36b2(brgyad stong): las 'das nas gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ gau zhal du med grangs med pa'i sen bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong yongasu mya ngan las bzlas
36b3(brgyad stong): gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi sa la zhugs
36b4(brgyad stong): te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs mya ngan las 'dil
36b5(brgyad stong): bar 'gyuraro// zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te gal te sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i so las 'das pa
36b6(brgyad stong): dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas gi zhal du med grangs med pa'i sen rnams kyi don mdzad de/ gau zhal du med grangs med
36b7(brgyad stong): pa'i sen bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par
37a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya su nges par mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan
37a2(brgyad stong): las 'das pa'i dbyingasasu sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya na/ des yang ci ltar
37a3(brgyad stong): 'di la gnas par bya ci ltar bslab par bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems
37a4(brgyad stong): kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
37a5(brgyad stong): po'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
37a6(brgyad stong): ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni shin du mi gnas pa ste/ de ni
37a7(brgyad stong): 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas la/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas te/ de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
37b1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta bu nyid du gnas par bya
37b2(brgyad stong): zhing 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig la gnas pa ma yin zhing mi gnas
37b3(brgyad stong): pa yang ma yin la mi mthun par gnas pa yang ma yin zhing / mi mthun par mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
37b4(brgyad stong): gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam ning de bzhin du bslab par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas na mi gnas
37b5(brgyad stong): pa'i tshul gyis shes par gnas pa yin no snyam du 'dis de ltar bslab par bya'o// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gnas par bya zhing de bzhin
37b6(brgyad stong): du bslab par bya ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pa 'di ni gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang
37b7(brgyad stong): me bral ba yin no// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi skad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / gnod sbyin
38a1(brgyad stong): gyi tshig dang / gnod sbyin gyi gtam du byas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rab tu brjod pa gang yin pa de dag smras pa ni/ shes par rung gi/ gnas brtan rab 'byor/ 
38a2(brgyad stong): 'chad pa dang brjod pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston po dang / 'di ni shes par yang mi rung ngo snyam/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de dag gi
38a3(brgyad stong): sems kyi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid de lta bu sems kyis yongasu shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag shis par mi rung zhes bya ba de ni 'di ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos
38a4(brgyad stong): pa med de/ 'di la cung zad kyang thos pa med do// de nas lha'i bu de dag yang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ e ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par
38a5(brgyad stong): 'gyuraro// e ma ho'i phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa rab 'byor ni ring ba bas kyang ches ring du 'jug pa 'phags pa rab 'byor ni
38a6(brgyad stong): phra ba bas kyang ches phra ba zab pa bas kyang ches zab par 'jug pas ston zhing 'chad do snyam// de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de
38a7(brgyad stong): dag gis sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag de lta bas na gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
38b1(brgyad stong): 'dod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub po// de bzhin du sbyar te gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
38b2(brgyad stong): 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi
38b3(brgyad stong): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang dag bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub
38b4(brgyad stong): thob par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub po// gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
38b5(brgyad stong): par 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub po// de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam
38b6(brgyad stong): du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la chos nyan po'i rang bzhin ci lta bu zhig btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
38b7(brgyad stong): gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lho'i bu dag kho bo la chos nyan pa ni sgyu ma dang sprul pa lta bu dag btsal
39a1(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan par mi 'gyur ro// mngon du 'du byed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
39a2(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin gyi/ de dag sgyu ma lta bu ni ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan
39a3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dge sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu lho'i bu dag sems can de dgra ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ lce
39a4(brgyad stong): bu dag de ltar no sgyu ma dang sems can dag ni gnyisu med de gnyis byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam dang sems can de dag ni gnyi su med de gnyisu byar med do// 
39a5(brgyad stong): lho'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun du zhugs pa sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu
39a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lte bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid
39a7(brgyad stong): kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzog/ 
39b1(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang
39b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ yang dag par
39b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'dus pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam
39b4(brgyad stong): lta bur sgra na chos gzhan lta ci smos/ lha'i bu de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// zhes zer ram/ 
39b5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag bdag ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa lus khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod kyang de yang sgyu
39b6(brgyad stong): ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o// lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// de ltar rmi lam dang mya ngan las
39b7(brgyad stong): 'das pa 'di ni gnyi su med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa lto rings chen po dang
40a1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen po dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dang
40a2(brgyad stong): thabs gcig tu tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la su
40a3(brgyad stong): ngag yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir mi ldog pa'i
40a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de dag shes ra
40a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// 
40a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan po dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di la chos gang
40a7(brgyad stong): yang ma smos chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma gzhag go// de bas na ci ltar 'di la chos gang yang mi smos chos gang yang yongasu snang ba
40b1(brgyad stong): ma byas chos gang yang mu bzhag pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa gang yang mi 'byung ngo // de nas lha rnas
40b2(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa la bdag gis kyang mchod pa'i don du 'di ltar me to// 
40b3(brgyad stong): dag mngon par sgrol te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor to snyamo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i tshe me tog dag mngon par sprul nas tshe
40b4(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor to// de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la rjesu brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam du sems/ 
40b5(brgyad stong): te/ yang 'di ltar lho rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tig 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas na yang yod pa ma
40b6(brgyad stong): mthong ste/ me tog 'dri dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang pos mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni shing dang gel ba dang khri shing las skyes pa ma yin/ 
40b7(brgyad stong): gyi yid las byung ba'i me tog snyam pa dang / de rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa ra
41a1(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las skyes pa'i me tog ni gang yang med de/ shi
41a2(brgyad stong): dang gel ba dang khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka grang khyod
41a3(brgyad stong): 'di skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las skyes po ma yin gyi/ shing dang gil ba dang khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin zhes zer na// 
41a4(brgyad stong): kr-i shi ka gang ma skyes pa de ni me tog ma yin no// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor ni shes rab zab ste/ 
41a5(brgyad stong): ming dang tshig tu btags pa de yang ston la de dang 'gal bar yang mi byed/ de nyid kyang gsal bar byed cing de nyid kyang nye bar ston to snyamo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
41a6(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ci skad du nye bar ston pa de bzhi/ 
41a7(brgyad stong): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la bslab par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
41b1(brgyad stong): byin la 'di skad ces smraso// kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab par bya'o// kau shi ka byang chub
41b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob bo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slog phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
41b3(brgyad stong): bu la mi slob/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slob bo// rang sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob/ sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob ste/ gang sa 'di dag la mi slob pa de ni sangs rgyas nyid
41b4(brgyad stong): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// gang sangs rgyas nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs med po la slob
41b5(brgyad stong): bo// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs med pa la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma
41b6(brgyad stong): yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ de rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// gang gzugs 'phel ba dang / 
41b7(brgyad stong): 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po dang / gang tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gang rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib
42a1(brgyad stong): par bya ba'i phyir mi skyob pa de ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams
42a2(brgyad stong): lam yin/ de rnam par shes pa yongasu gzung ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// chos 'ga' zhig yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob ste/ skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir/ 
42a3(brgyad stong): mi slob bo// gang chos 'ga' zhig yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slos
42a4(brgyad stong): cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thaMd mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges
42a5(brgyad stong): par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
42a6(brgyad stong): gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye
42a7(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thaMd mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thad mkhyen
42b1(brgyad stong): pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sa
42b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ches 'ga' zhig yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob
42b3(brgyad stong): cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongasu gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar
42b4(brgyad stong): slob po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha rnams kyi
42b5(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang
42b6(brgyad stong): las btsal bar bya/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis le'u las
42b7(brgyad stong): btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'phags pa
43a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya/ su'i byin gyis rlabasu rig par bya/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
43a2(brgyad stong): smras pa/ kau shi ka tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di ni de bzhin pa
43a3(brgyad stong): ba'i byin gyis brlabasu rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka gang 'di skad du 'a
43a4(brgyad stong): pa rabo 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di su'i byin gyis rlabasu rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka bdag
43a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di ni dri bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabasu rig par bya'o// 
43a6(brgyad stong): kau shi ka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa las btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka byang
43a7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzugs las btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de bzhin
43b1(brgyad stong): du tshor ba las ma yin/ 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las btsal bar mi bya/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal
43b2(brgyad stong): bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
43b3(brgyad stong): pa med do// de bzhin de tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las
43b4(brgyad stong): gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// 
43b5(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
43b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin/ 
43b7(brgyad stong): po'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smos
44a1(brgyad stong): pa/ de de bzhin no kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ 
44a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshed ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shI ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin
44a3(brgyad stong): pa'o// kau shi ka 'di lta s+t+wa~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs che ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta skyo/ 
44a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa che ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta
44a5(brgyad stong): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma
44a6(brgyad stong): med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad ma med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
44a7(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol
44b1(brgyad stong): du phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir kau shrI ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad me
44b2(brgyad stong): po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor
44b3(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'du shos dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir kau sha~M ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyi
44b4(brgyad stong): pa'o// kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa chen po zhes bya bar mngon par chags par mi byed do// de bzhin du tshad ma med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin
44b5(brgyad stong): du tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o zhes mngon par chags par mi byed do// kau sh+tsi ka de lta bas na 'di lta
44b6(brgyad stong): ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shi ka 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shI ka dmigs pa mtha'
44b7(brgyad stong): yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yos pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes
45a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shi ka yang ci ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha
45a2(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yos pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma mi dmigs te/ de bas na kau shi ka
45a3(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ kr-i shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
45a4(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang gang gi phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad mtha' yas mu med de/ de rnams kyi thog ma 'am dbus
45a5(brgyad stong): sam tha mo yang mi dmigs te/ de bas na kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka gzug
45a6(brgyad stong): kyi thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmig so// kau shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i thog ma 'am dbus sam thu mo
45a7(brgyad stong): yang mi migs te/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lto ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// / 
45b1(brgyad stong): kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas mu med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmig so// kau shi ka de bas na sems
45b2(brgyad stong): can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa
45b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar+ya na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas
45b4(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa yin/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka bgrang ba dang mi ldan pa 'am/ bgrang ba mang pos sems can mtho' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 
45b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yino// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'o na ci ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i/ 
45b6(brgyad stong): phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di
45b7(brgyad stong): lto ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yon/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can
46a1(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos med pa'i tshig bla dwags kyang ma yin te/ ming du btags pa 'di ni blo bur du byung ngo // ming du btag
46a2(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni bdag gi ba med pa'o// 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes ming du btags pa 'di ni dmig su med pa'o// 
46a3(brgyad stong): gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems 'di la sems can du yongasasu bstan par byas pa grang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phaT/ 
46a4(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang la sems can yongasu byas pa 'ga' zhig med pa de la sen mtha' yas pa yod dam/ kau shi ka ga
46a5(brgyad stong): te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bskal po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang zhugs te/ mtha' las 'das pa rnam par
46a6(brgyad stong): rig par byed pa'i dbyangs dang gsung dbyangs zab mos sems can sems can zhes tshig tu brjod du zin kyang de la sems can gang yang skyes pa 'am skye bar 'gyur
46a7(brgyad stong): ba'am skyo ba 'am 'gog pa 'am 'gag por 'gyur ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
46b1(brgyad stong): can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir dang thog ma nas yongasu dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'dra
46b2(brgyad stong): lha ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// kau shi ka de ltar yang sems can mtha' bras pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa maH
46b3(brgyad stong): yas par rig par bya'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdug po dang btsos pa dang / drang srong dang bcas pa
46b4(brgyad stong): dang skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ e ma'o chos e ma'o chos e me'o chos rnams kyi
46b5(brgyad stong): ches nyid de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa gnas brten rab 'byor gyis legs par smras pas brjod cing bstan te 'ashad la rab tu bzhag
46b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gong shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub sems dang/ 
46b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'dzin to// dode nas bcom ldan
47a1(brgyad stong): 'das kyis dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang drang srong dang bcas pa dang / skyes pa
47a2(brgyad stong): dang bud med kyi tshogs de rnams la bka' bstsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na mar me can zhes bya
47a3(brgyad stong): ba'i tshong dus kyi dbus su mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung nang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang ma bral
47a4(brgyad stong): bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa
47a5(brgyad stong): grangs med pa na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang por ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa
47a6(brgyad stong): 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes nga bla na med pa yang
47a7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa
47b1(brgyad stong): chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub par byed pa dang rjes su yong su 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar to// bde bar ga h+ye/ 
47b2(brgyad stong): pa shin du ngo mtshar to zhes gsol to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// 
47b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa// / bam po gsum pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus te
47b4(brgyad stong): 'khod par gyur pa dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu de rnams 'khod par
47b5(brgyad stong): gyur par mkhyen zhing 'khor bzhi po thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par yang mkhyen nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs ris
47b6(brgyad stong): kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'od gsal dang dge chung dang 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dbang du bzhag ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod
47b7(brgyad stong): pi'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnas la bka' bskul pa/ lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am
48a1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam rab tu 'dron na/ de la bdud dam bdud kyi
48a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi lha'i bu glags lta ba dang / glags tshel ba dag gisau glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la mi 'om mi ma yin pa glags lta ba dang / 
48a3(brgyad stong): glags tshil ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la'ang yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag
48a4(brgyad stong): gzhan yang lha'i bu gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
48a5(brgyad stong): 'di ma bzung ba drang ma bcings pa dang / ma klags pa dang kun chub par ma byas pa dang rab tu mi 'don pa'i lha'i bu de dag rigs kyi bu 'dre'i drung du 'ong 'dod par 'gyur
48a6(brgyad stong): te rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de la nyan par 'gyur te thos nas
48a7(brgyad stong): kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
48b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de dgon par song yang rung / shing drung du song
48b2(brgyad stong): yang rung khyim stong du song yang rung bla gab med par song yang rung / lam gol bar song yang rung 'brog dgon par song yang rung rgya mtsho chen por song yang rung / de
48b3(brgyad stong): der 'gro ba 'am 'tshag pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am nyal ba na yang rung ste/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'ongs par 'gyur ba nyid mi 'byung mi skye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
48b4(brgyad stong): la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang
48b5(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de ni theg pa gsum gyi sen rnams 'dul bar bgyid cing / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa ni
48b6(brgyad stong): ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub
48b7(brgyad stong): par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad
49a1(brgyad stong): ga ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /

49a3(brgyad stong): po tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
49a4(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o//

49a6(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa tshe 'dri la yon tan 'di dag nges par 'thob cing yongasu 'dzin par
49a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzung na pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces
49b1(brgyad stong): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka shes rab
49b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzung bas pha rol du phyin pa drug po tha~Md bzung bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang
49b3(brgyad stong): ba dang klog po dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di drag 'dzin par 'gyur ba
49b4(brgyad stong): de thams cad legs par nyin la yid la bzung shig dang khyed la boshad do// bcom ldan 'dres la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis leg so zhes gsol nas/ lha rnam
49b5(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// kau sha~M ka di la gang zhig ces 'di la brtsod par
49b6(brgyad stong): 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod na/ brtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi brtsod pa dang rgol ba
49b7(brgyad stong): dang 'gal bar byed pa skyes shing skyes pa rnams slar nub pa nyid du 'gyur zhing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ brtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar
50a1(brgyad stong): byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongasasu rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'gyur te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu

50a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang / nye ba ri sten pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa de tshe 'di la yon
50a6(brgyad stong): ton 'di dag kyang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba dug thad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhig yod de der skye bo sbrul gdug pa bkres
50a7(brgyad stong): shing zas 'dod de zas tshol ba zhig gis srog chagasu gyur pa 'ga' zhig mthong ste skye bo sbrul bdug pa des zas kyi phyir bza' bar 'dod nas/ srog chagasu rgyu
50b1(brgyad stong): pa de'i dri'i phyogs su 'brang zhing bstsags pa dang / de nas srog chags su gyur pa de rtsim gyi gang na yod pa dor song nas phyin te 'dug pa dang / de nas sbrul de rtsi de'i
50b2(brgyad stong): dri tsam gyis phyir ldog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sbrul gyi gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa de ni rtsi de'i sman gyi yon tan du blta bar bya ste rtsi de ni de ltar mthu che'o// 
50b3(brgyad stong): kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu
50b4(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed po de la ni kr-i shi ka rtsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa'i gzhi skyes shing skyes pa/ 
50b5(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang stobs dang / mthu dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stobs bskyod pas myur du de nyid nas med
50b6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur nye bar zhi zhing 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ de gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas 'gag cing nub par 'gyur la gnas par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe
50b7(brgyad stong): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin pa dag nye bar zhi bar byed de rnam par 'phel bar byed pa
51a1(brgyad stong): ma yin no// kau shi ka rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
51a2(brgyad stong): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par

51a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur tshig rin par 'gyur tshig 'chal ba med par 'gyuraro// khro bas zil gyis non par mi 'gyur/ nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
51a7(brgyad stong): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dul bar byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongasu 'dud par byed de khro ba 'phel bar mi byed/ nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed/ 
51b1(brgyad stong): khon du 'dzin pa yongasu mi 'chang / gnod sems yongasu mi 'chang la bag la nyal bar mi 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar spyod pa de la dran pa dang byams
51b2(brgyad stong): pa skye bar 'gyur zhing de 'di snyam du sems te gal te bdag gis gnod sems bskyed du zin na bdag gi dbang po rnams 'khrugs shing bzhin gyi mdog kyang 'gyur
51b3(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs shing 'di la slob par 'dod pa khro ba'i dbang du 'gro ba 'di ni mi rig so snyam nas de myur du dran
51b4(brgyad stong): pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ kau shri ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'tshang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang
