256b4(brgyad stong): kyi yongasu chad pa yin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi yongasu chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o 'di ni gya nom pa'o// 'di ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 'di ni ci lta ba bzhin
256b5(brgyad stong): no// 'di ni phyin ci log pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
256b6(brgyad stong): nas 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
256b7(brgyad stong): nas 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sas
257a1(brgyad stong): rgyas nas/ dus ring por ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang ling tog gis yong su khebs pa'i sems can mun pas zil gyis non pa rnams shes rab kyis snang bar byed kyi
257a2(brgyad stong): mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel bar byed phye/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
257a3(brgyad stong): bar sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
257a4(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi yongasasu 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs
257a5(brgyad stong): rgyas nas/ gzugs rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes rab 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis skye ba med
257a6(brgyad stong): ba dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye
257a7(brgyad stong): ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par chos ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang
257a8(brgyad stong): rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// chos thams cad kyang bzhin byis
257b1(brgyad stong): skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
257b2(brgyad stong): rgyas nas 'jig rten yongasu 'dren par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'jin
257b3(brgyad stong): rten gyi brten du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten la
257b4(brgyad stong): gzugs ni na mkha'i rten no zhes chos ston par 'gyur de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang na mkha'i brdan no zhes chos ston par
257b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang na mkha'i rten can 'gro ba med pa 'ong ba med pa na mkha' dang / mtshungs pa sden ci ltar na mkha' 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med
257b6(brgyad stong): pa mo byas pa rnam par mi 'gyur ba/ mngon par 'dus mi byas pa/ mi gnas pa yang dag par mi gnas pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa de bzhin du rab 'byor
257b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyang 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa/ mi byas po rnam par mi 'gyur ba/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ mi gnas pa yang dag par mi gnas pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ me skyes
257b8(brgyad stong): pa ma 'gags/ na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// de bzhin
258a1(brgyad stong): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad
258a2(brgyad stong): kyi stong pa nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
258a3(brgyad stong): mtshan ma med pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rngon can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon
258a4(brgyad stong): bar 'du mi byed pa'i rten can te de dgra rten de lus mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung ba med pa'i rten can te de dgra rten de lus mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams
258a5(brgyad stong): cad ni skye ba med pa'i rden can te/ dri dag ni rten dri las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos
258a6(brgyad stong): thams cad ni rmi lam gyi rten can te de dag rden de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gri rten can du de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams
258a7(brgyad stong): cad ni mu med pa'i rten can de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhi ba'i rten can te de dag ni rjen de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mya
258b1(brgyad stong): ngan lus 'das pa'i rten can dri dri dag de na de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbyung du med pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'anga'o// rab 'byor chos thams
258b2(brgyad stong): cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i rten can byed drug rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'anga'o// rab 'byor chos thams
258b3(brgyad stong): cad ni mi g.yo ba'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thaMd
258b4(brgyad stong): ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes bri'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas
258b5(brgyad stong): nyid dang / bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// de bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
258b6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rten can no zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
258b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
259a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di su dag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub
259a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
259a3(brgyad stong): smin pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis
259a4(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta
259a5(brgyad stong): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur
259a6(brgyad stong): ba de dag ni 'dul ba las byung ba dben pa'i rang bzhin can no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ci de lta bu'i rten
259a7(brgyad stong): can kho nar 'gyur ba dang rten de dag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dge la yang rten 'di nyi ston par 'gyur zhi// 'di dag de ltar sems can rnam/ 
259b1(brgyad stong): kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de
259b2(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'di lta bu'i rten can du 'gyur ba dang / rten 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dag
259b3(brgyad stong): la rten 'di dag ston par 'gyur zhing / de dag de ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
259b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gzhal du med pa drangs med pa dag gi rten du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
259b5(brgyad stong): sems can gzhal du ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes go cha 'di dgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba bgyid pa lagaso// 
259b6(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces dka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gzhal du med
259b7(brgyad stong): grangs med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes gang gis go cha 'di dgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
260a1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po dgos pa'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba yang ma yin gzugs kyi don du 'brel ba yang ma yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
260a2(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyis dang 'brel ba yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi sa'i don du 'brel ba yang ma yin/ rangs sa rgyas
260a3(brgyad stong): sa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du 'brel ba yang ma yino// de ci'i phyir ni
260a4(brgyad stong): na/ rab 'byor kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po dgos pa'i go cha 'di ni chos thams cad dang ma 'brel ba'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
260a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ma chen po dgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo la de ltar skyed pa des gnas gsum la re bar mi bgyi ste/ gsum gang nen/ 'di lta
260a6(brgyad stong): ste/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis 'am/ sangs rgyas kyisa'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab byo
260a7(brgyad stong): khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'di skad du/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgos pa shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa des gnas gsum la re bar
260b1(brgyad stong): mi bya ste/ gsum gang nem 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
260b2(brgyad stong): 'gos pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo le de ltar spyod pa de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis la rab 'di ni gnas med cing go skabs med do// 'on kyang gang gis sems can
260b3(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi dron du go cha chen po bgos pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid la re bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab ste/ de ni sus bya
260b4(brgyad stong): bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ de ni gdu gis kyang snyoms par ma gyur/ gang gis kyang sgom par mi byed/ gang gis kyang sgom par mi 'gyur/ sgom par bgyi ba yang cung zad ma mchis/ gang du
260b5(brgyad stong): sgom par bgyi ba yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chos gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
260b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' sgom pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'a
260b7(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni ma chags pa sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni mtha' yas bsgom pa leg so// 
261a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
261a2(brgyad stong): bsgom pa 'di ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis bsgom pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal
261a3(brgyad stong): to// rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo'i gnas pas gnas
261a4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lis phyir mi ldog par brtan par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems
261a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags par mi byed pa dang 'di ltar gzhan gyis sbrus bu dang gzhan gyis spros pa dgal
261a6(brgyad stong): mngon par chags par mi byed pa dang / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol gyi dad pa'i phyir mi 'brang ba dang / rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
261a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mi 'gong kun du mi zhum mi dngang kun du mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ nem nur mi byed
261b1(brgyad stong): the tsom mi barmongs byar mi 'gyur zhing / rtogs par byed/ mos par byed/ shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa mthong ba dang thos par dga' bas na/ rab 'byor 'dis sngon gyi ma
261b2(brgyad stong): yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dris par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mi dang kun du
261b3(brgyad stong): skrag/ kun du skrag pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
261b4(brgyad stong): mo 'di bshad pa la mi dngang / kun du mi sgrog kun du skrag pa dang ldan par myi 'gyur na/ bac+doMs rnam pa gleng gis byes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bye brag tu rtags pa lags/ bcom ldan
261b5(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bye brag tu
261b6(brgyad stong): rtags bya yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 
261b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor na mkha' la gzhol ba'i rgyud dang / rab 'byor na mkha' la 'bab pa dang / rab 'byor na mkha' la phyogs pa'i rgyud kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhos
262a1(brgyad stong): ba'i rgyu kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyi du la bye brag tu 'jigs pa yin no// rab 'byor yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud kyis bye brag tu
262a2(brgyad stong): brtags pa yin de ni bye brag tu brtags pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med pa'o// rab 'byor thams cad mokhyen pa nyid ni cha
262a3(brgyad stong): mi med pa'o// rab 'byor gzhal du myed pa dang tshad ma med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du shes rnams ma yin/ rnam par
262a4(brgyad stong): shes pa ma yin/ thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ khong du chud pa ma yin/ lam ma yin lam gyi 'bras bu ma yin/ ye shes ma yin rnam par shes pa ma yin
262a5(brgyad stong): skye ba ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ 'grib pa ma yin/ 'gog bla ma yin// sgom pa ma yin/ rnam par skem pa ma yin te/ sus kyang ma byas gang nas kyang ma
262a6(brgyad stong): 'ongs gang du yang mi 'gro/ yul gang du yang mi gnas/ phyogs gang du yang mi gnas pa gzhan du na gzhal du med pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i glang su 'gro'o// 
262a7(brgyad stong): na mkha' gzhal du med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhal du med pa ste/ gzhal du med pa gang yin pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus
262b1(brgyad stong): te/ gzugs kyis ma yin/ tshor bas ma yin/ 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ tshu
262b2(brgyad stong): khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin/ bas mo gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin te
262b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin
262b4(brgyad stong): du tshor ba nyid dang / 'di shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du
262b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dri bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin
262b6(brgyad stong): bya nyid dang / bsam gratan+da gyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid dang / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang po
262b7(brgyad stong): byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang / mi 'jid kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das
263a1(brgyad stong): la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs daci
263a2(brgyad stong): tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang
263a3(brgyad stong): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab pa'o// bcom
263a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bding dpag dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni blta dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyis
263a5(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' sti/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag
263a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa na/ brtson pa chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa
263a7(brgyad stong): la gzhol bar mdzad do// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po
263b1(brgyad stong): tshangs pa yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du
263b2(brgyad stong): ba 'di ni zab pa'o// lha'i bu dgu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bding dpag dka' ba'o// lha'i ngag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni blta dka' ba'o// lha'i bu dgra
263b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rtogs par dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
263b4(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa na/ kye mchos zab mo 'di ngas mngon par rdzogs par
263b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas so snyam pas/ brtson pa chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de chos bstan pa la gzhol bar mdzad do// gang du sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas su
263b6(brgyad stong): yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur/ su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ba 'di ni chos kyi zab pa yin no// nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 
263b7(brgyad stong): bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
263b8(brgyad stong): nga'i chos 'di zab pa yin no// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang mi 'jed
264a1(brgyad stong): kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa rmad du byung
264a2(brgyad stong): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi bzung ba'i slad du chos 'di bstan pa la byas
264a3(brgyad stong): na 'jig rten dag ni 'dzin pa la spyod do// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las lha'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// / shes rab kyi phar
264a4(brgyad stong): du phyin bya brgyad stong pa// bam po bco lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'ang stsal tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
264a5(brgyad stong): te// bcom ldan 'das kye ma chos bstan pa 'di ni chos thams cad dmi gsum mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan
264a6(brgyad stong): 'das kye ma na mkha' dang mtshungs pas gnas thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi ma gnyis
264a7(brgyad stong): su ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kye ma rgol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni do zla ma mchis pa'i mtshan
264b1(brgyad stong): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kye ma mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa'i spyad du chos 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kye ma skye ba thams cad skye
264b2(brgyad stong): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kye mu lam thams cad mi dmyigs pa'i slad du chos 'di ni lam ma mchis pa'o// de na
264b3(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyi dbang po bairgya byinA dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di sku
264b4(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'phags pa gnas brtson rab 'byor 'di ni rjes su 'thun par skyes pa lcags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
264b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni 'di ltar chos gang dang gang kho nar ston pa'i chos de dang de nyid stong pa nyid las brtsams te ston pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang
264b6(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces
264b7(brgyad stong): smras so// lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'thun par skyes so// zhes smras pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gnas nan
265a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'thun par skyes te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su so ba'o// 
265a2(brgyad stong): ci ltar dri bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'ong ba yang med song ba yang med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'ong ba yang med song ba yang
265a3(brgyad stong): med de/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su spong ba'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor ni dang po nyid nus de bzhin gabye ba'i
265a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad
265a5(brgyad stong): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyi de bzhin gshegs bya'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang
265a6(brgyad stong): yin pa de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid do// gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song ba ste/ de byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyeso// 
265a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ de bzhin nyid de'i rjesu song ba'o// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdza/ 
265b1(brgyad stong): skyes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa des gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa'o// 
265b2(brgyad stong): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rdog pa med pa de bzhin du// gnas pa
265b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med pa dang rnam par 'gyur ba med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de ltar na gnas brtan rab
265b4(brgyad stong): yang de bzhin nyid des 'gyur ba med pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba med pa rdog pa med pa rnam par rtog pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyeso// ci ltar de bzhin
265b5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med rnam par rtog pa med de gang la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med
265b6(brgyad stong): rnam par 'gyur ba med/ rtog pa med rnam par rtog pa med de gang la yang tho gas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gsheshregs pa'i de bzhin nyi dra gang yin pa dang / 
265b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig ste gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// gnyi su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang dul
265b8(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid ma yin/ gang las kyang de bzhin nyid ma yin/ gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ gang gi phyir de ni gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa des na de bzhin nyid
266a1(brgyad stong): de ni gnyis su med pa ste gnyi su med pa'i dri bzhin nyid ni gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bani/ 
266a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes te/ ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma
266a3(brgyad stong): yin par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gnyi su byar med do// de ltar nu gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de
266a4(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du// gnas
266a5(brgyad stong): brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtogo// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dang rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid kyis mngon pa
266a6(brgyad stong): sprul pa ste/ 'ad gaug ka yang bskal pa ma yin zhing tha mi dad pa ste/ tha dad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gabye ba'i rjes
266a7(brgyad stong): so// dri ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang chos thams cad
266a8(brgyad stong): khyo bzhin nyid las gzhan ma len la chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nying las gzhan ma yin pa gang min pa de ni gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur me bzhin
266b1(brgyad stong): nyid de nyid ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid de la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song bar khas blangs te/ 'di
266b2(brgyad stong): 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu rje su song bar khas blangs pa yang med do// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skye so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
266b3(brgyad stong): de bzhini nyid 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa mu yin da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin ma 'ong sna pa ma yinA da ltar byu
266b4(brgyad stong): ma yin te/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin nyid de'i rje su song bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang
266b5(brgyad stong): de bzhini nyid kyi rjes su song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin ga
266b6(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhi ni nyid kyis rjes song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes song ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
266b7(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song ngo // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs
267a1(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjesu so // 
267a2(brgyad stong): 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid kyi rje su song ngo // de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid
267a3(brgyad stong): drang 'das bu dang ma 'ongs pa dang de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// de bzhin du chos tha~Md kyi
267a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid dang rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni
267a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhi ni nyid de/ de bzhin nyid gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
267a6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po bla nA med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni
267a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid 'di yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di bstan pa de'i tshe na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
267b1(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba bzhin du sa chen po 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug dang lhas chen po bco brgyad du 'gul rab tu 'gul kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yo
267b2(brgyad stong): ldeg rab tu ldeg kun du rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu la thugs kun du rab du 'khrugs/ che mtshe ma rab tu chemache ma kun du rab tu chu men ma 'ur 'ur rab tu
267b3(brgyad stong): shur kun du rab tu 'ur 'u ra ro// gzhan yang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lci'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag de ltar na gnas brta ni rab 'byor ni de bzhin ga shegs pa'i
267b4(brgyad stong): skyes so// gzhan yang gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rje su me skyes te/ tshor ba'i ma yin 'du shes kyi ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rje su ma skyeso// 
267b5(brgyad stong): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rje sum skyes te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong de'i 'bras bu ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i rje su ma skyeso// rang sangs
267b6(brgyad stong): nyid kyi rje su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis ci 'dab chags bya des phyir sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na gnas par nus
267b7(brgyad stong): sam/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te yang 'di snyam du kye ma bdag ni ma smras ma
268a1(brgyad stong): gang rjes skye ba'i tshe ste de dag ni ma drug par smon pa ma yin skye skye par mi dmigs so// de ltar na gnas panan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes/ 
268a2(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pA ri bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo lags so// de skad ces
268a3(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no dri de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu 'di lnga ste de bzhin
268a4(brgyad stong): nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo yin no// de bzhin nyid bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang dge slong sum brgya len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga
268a5(brgyad stong): brgya yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri mra dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lho'i bu lnga stong sngon yongasu sbyang ba byas pa dag gis mi skye bo'i chos la bzod patso/ 
268a6(brgyad stong): par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' drug bcu len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' de rnams len
268a7(brgyad stong): pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams
268b1(brgyad stong): len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
268b2(brgyad stong): dpa' 'di dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas shing thams cad du yang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams
268b3(brgyad stong): bsam gdan dgra bskyed de// de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thabs pa dang bral bar gyur to// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
268b4(brgyad stong): dpa' 'di dag gi la mi stong pa nyid da ma mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa'am smon pa med pa yin mod kyi de ltar na yang de drag thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir yang dag
268b5(brgyad stong): mtha' mngon du byas nas/ nyan thos kyi sa nges par 'byung gi sangs rgyas kyi sar ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dbyer na 'da' chags bya zhig gi lus dpag tshad brgya
268b6(brgyad stong): 'am dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa'am dpag tshad lnga brgya pa tsam du gyur pa zhig yod de/ de sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i
268b7(brgyad stong): lha'i nang du 'dug pa las 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'gro'o snyam du sems shing shA ri'i bu 'dab chags bya de 'dab ma ma skyes pa'am 'dab ma bya bar gyur pa'am 'dab ma bcad
269a1(brgyad stong): par gyur la/ des 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs te 'dab chags
269a2(brgyad stong): byed de nas lhung ba dang / nam mkha'i bar snang la gnas pa'i bar der 'di skam du kye ma'o bdag phyir sum rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du gnas par bya'o snyam du sems/ shA ri'i
269a3(brgyad stong): bu de ci snyam du sems/ ci 'dab chags byi des phyir sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na gnas par nus sam/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
269a4(brgyad stong): de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te yang 'di snyam du kye ma bdag ni ma smas ma smad par 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o
269a5(brgyad stong): snyam na/ shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ sems ci 'dra ba chags bye de ma smras ma smad par 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'as
269a6(brgyad stong): de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung nas spras shing sbed par 'gyur te/ de 'gul pa 'am 'gum pa la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// ngon
269a7(brgyad stong): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar lags te/ gang gi lus kyang chen por gyur pa dang 'dab ma yang ma mchis par gyur pa dang / 'thon po zhig nas kyang ltung bar rgyu
269b1(brgyad stong): ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bskul to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
269b2(brgyad stong): de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bskul ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
269b3(brgyad stong): du ga nas shing sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims srungs bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan la mnyam paro gzhag ste/ de rgya cher yang dag par zhugs
269b4(brgyad stong): par gyur cing bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar de'i sems cher bskyed par gyur kyang gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
269b5(brgyad stong): 'dis yongasu ma zin cing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ldong ngo // shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'as
269b6(brgyad stong): pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims de dang / tinge 'dzin de dang / shes rab de dang / rnam par grol ba de dang / rnam par grol
269b7(brgyad stong): ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sems shing 'dzin par byed pa des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
270a1(brgyad stong): kyi tshul khrims mi shes mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin ma yin shes rab ma yin rnam par grol ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par rdza/ 
270a2(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // des ma shes ma mthong bas stong pa nyid kyi sgra nyin cing des sgra de la mtshan mer byed
270a3(brgyad stong): de/ mtshan mar byas nus bla nu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar 'dod pa de'i phyir 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas
270a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pa de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro// 
270a5(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci ltar bshad pa'i don bdog gis 'tshol ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bsod nams kyi tshogs shin du mang po dang ldan du
270a6(brgyad stong): legs kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su ma bzung la thabs mkhas pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma ldan par gyur na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rjes
270a7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub 'thob pa la the tsom du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par

279a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin nyid rab tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams khyad par med pa dang / bye brag med pa dang / tha dad du bya ba med par thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems

279a6(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di nges par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu bla na med pa yadzi

279b1(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ci ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar slab par

279b3(brgyad stong): can thams cad la mnyam par gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya ste/ mi mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyis gzhan la dmigs par bya byams pa'i
279b4(brgyad stong): sems kyis gzhan la dmigs par bya/ phan pa'i sems kyis gzhan la dmigs par bya/ dge ba'i sems kyis gzhan la dmigs par bya/ nga rgyal bcag pa'i sems kyis gzhan la

279b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu'i mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ sems can thams cad

280a7(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa gang dag lags/ rtags gang ga
280b1(brgyad stong): lags/ mtshan ma gang dag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar bdag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lags 'tshal bar dbye / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
280b2(brgyad stong): sprul pa/ rab 'byor so so'i skye bo'i sa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyis gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid kyis zhes bya ste/

280b6(brgyad stong): tshig tu smra ste don dang mi ldan pa ma yin zhing / pha rol gyis byas bdag dang ma byas pa la mi lta ste/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang / ldan pa'i byang chub sems

285b5(brgyad stong): bcom pa nyid thob cing dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas pa yin na/ khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur zhes/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses da

285b7(brgyad stong): bar gzung bar bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i 'bral bar byed pa'i tshi ga rnams gzhan las thos nas/ seMs chos nyid las yongasu nyes par ma
286a1(brgyad stong): de'i ying phyir ldog par mi 'gyur/ de'i phyiras gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing bdud kyi las de dag thaMd de ltar shes na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen pogeng
286a2(brgyad stong): de ltar pha rol du phyin pa dag la spyod pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs medo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
286a3(brgyad stong): ltar spyod cing de ltar slob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni ltar gsungs pa'i spyod pa de dang ma bral ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yad la byed pa de dag dang ma bral ba bdud sdig can
286a4(brgyad stong): gyis glegs rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs medado// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdud kyis rnams khong du chud cing 'bral bar byed pa'i
286a5(brgyad stong): tshig rnams gzhan las thos nas yongasu mi nyams/ de'i phyir mi ldog/ sems gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ bdud kyi las de dag de ltar shes na/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang
286a6(brgyad stong): mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bar gzung bya'o// dbyor
286a7(brgyad stong): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ni gzugs kyi 'du shes mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'du shes bskyed pa ma yin/ de bzhin du
286b1(brgyad stong): 'du shes ma yin/ 'du shes kyi 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes bskyed dam
286b2(brgyad stong): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ba'i chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
286b3(brgyad stong): 'jug ste/ chos de yang mi dmyigs shing mngon par 'jum byed mi bskyed// de bas na mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi bzod pa thob pa zhes bya skye/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang

286b7(brgyad stong): 'di ni yod pa ma yin pa ste/ su zhig de la shes par 'gyur su zhig de la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ des gang yang nges par mi 'byung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par
287a1(brgyad stong): 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya ba dang / gang shes par byed pa dang gang shes par byed pa dang / gang shes par bya ba'i chos de dag zang na mkha' dang mtshang

287a4(brgyad stong): rig par bya ste/ de ltar bsams nas de la sems bstan par bya'o// sems mi g.yo ba dang sems mi 'phrogs par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan med da/

287b1(brgyad stong): la yong su 'dres par bye'o// de bsam btan dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye na pa yang de nyid 'dod pa spyod pa'i chos rnams la gnas par byed de/ rab 'byor 'di yang

288b1(brgyad stong): du 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de thub par dka' zhing mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis 'da' bar mi nus par 'gyurarote/ sems can thad kyis bsnyen dka' bar 'gyu ro// de sems mi g.yeng bar 'gyur/ dbang ba ma tshang bar

292a4(brgyad stong): 'di dag yod na rab 'byor ji ltar de la yon tan 'di dag yod pa dang sbyar na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni gdon mi za bar sngon gyi de

292a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa gzhi yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

292b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i
292b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dam pa'i chos yongasasu gzung ba'i phyir bdag kyang yong su gtong bar byed/ srog kyang yongasu gtong bar byed/ de'i phyir rab 'byor byang
292b3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ni dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir shin du brtson par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das dang ma byon
292b4(brgyad stong): pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams la dga' ba dang gus pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi bsku'o zhes chos la dga' ba dang gus pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongasu

292b6(brgyad stong): kyi dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba yang 'di nyid yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba yang 'di nyid yin te/ de la
292b7(brgyad stong): bdag kyang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi grangasu bgrang bar btegs pa des na bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de la lung
293a1(brgyad stong): bstan te/ 'di ni bdag gi yang dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'o snyam ste/ don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir bdag nyid yongasu

293a5(brgyad stong): pa la nem nur med the tsom mi za'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa kho na chos ston pa la nem nur ma mchis shing the tsom mi

299b5(brgyad stong): chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes ma bshad dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos zad stong pa nyid do zhes bka' stsal

299b7(brgyad stong): yang de yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na chos 'di dag ni don la bye brag gam tha dad du bya ba mi dmigs te/ rab tu byor de dag ni mngon par rdzogs pa'o zhes de bzhin ga
300a1(brgyad stong): bstan cing brjod do// gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba'am grangs med pa zhes bya ba ma 'am/ mi zad pa zhes bya ba 'am/ stong pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'o// 
300a2(brgyad stong): smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa 'du byed pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'am/ mi skye ba zhes bya ba'am/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dod chags
300a3(brgyad stong): dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gog pa zhes bya ba'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byor bston pa mngon par sgrub pa bshad par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
300a4(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
300a5(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi bar 'di yang bstan la chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de yang brjod du ma mchis pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan
300a6(brgyad stong): 'das dag gis ni ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal bltar na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad kyang / brjod du ma mchis pa lag so// 
300a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor ches thams cad kyang brjod du med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos
300b1(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brjod du mi nus pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci brjod du ma mchis pa'i don la 'phel ba'am/ 
300b2(brgyad stong): yongasu 'grib pa mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te brjod
300b3(brgyad stong): du ma mchis pa'i don la 'phel ba ma mchis yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis na ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang 'phel ba ma mchis yongs su 'grib pa yang ma mchis
300b4(brgyad stong): der 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / gzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
300b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa dang / la yang bcom ldan 'das 'phel mi mchis yongasu 'grib pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
300b6(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di rnams la 'phel ba ma mchis yongasu 'grib pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rnam par mi'o bel ba'i pha rol du phyin pa drug
300b7(brgyad stong): rnams kyis stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
301a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba 'am/ ci ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma bgyis
301a2(brgyad stong): par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// 
301a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor yang pha rol du phyin pa'i don la 'phel ba'am yongs 'grib pa yang med mod kyi/ rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub seMs
301a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsgoms pa thabs mkhas pa ni 'di snyam sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
301a5(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni rnam par 'phel lo// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yongasu 'grib bo zhes bya bar mi sems kyi/ 'on kyang de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol du
301a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo zhes bsams nas/ de sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing yid la byed pa de dag dang sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge bo'i rtsa ba de dag bla na
301a7(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ci lta ba de bzhin du yongasu bsngo'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
301b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa ni 'di snyam du tshul khrims kyi pha rol
301b2(brgyad stong): du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'phel lo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yongs su 'grib po zhes mi sems kyi/ 'on kyang de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha
301b3(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'dri ni ming tsame zhes bsams nas/ de tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas shing yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / 
301b4(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ci lta ba de bzhin du yongasasu bsngo'o// / 
301b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa thabs mkhas po ni 'di
301b6(brgyad stong): snyam du bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'phel lo// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yongasasu 'grib bo zhes mi sems kyi/ 'on kyang de 'di snyam du 'di
301b7(brgyad stong): lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo snyam nas/ de bzod pa sgrub cing yid la byed pa de dge sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na
302a1(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su sngo ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ci lta ba de bzhin du yongasu bsngo'o// rab 'byor gzhan
302a2(brgyad stong): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin sgom pa thabs mkhas pa ni 'di snyam du brtsom
302a3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni par 'phel lo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yongasasu 'grib po zhes bya bar mi sems kyi/ 'on kyang de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste
302a4(brgyad stong): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du pa zhes bya ba 'di zhi ming tsam mo zhes bsams nas/ de brtson 'grus bcom zhing yid la byed pa de drag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / 
302a5(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ci lta ba de bzhin du yongasu bsngo'o// 
302a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa thabs mkhas
302a7(brgyad stong): pa ni 'di snyam du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'phelo// bsam gautan gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yongasu 'grib po zhes bya bar mi sems kyi// 
302b1(brgyad stong): 'on kyang de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo zhes bsams nas/ de bsam gtan dag la yang mnyam par gzhog
302b2(brgyad stong): la yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ste/ bla na med pa yang
302b3(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ci lnga ba de bzhin du yongasasu bsngo'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
302b4(brgyad stong): la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgoms pa thabs mkhas pa ni 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'belo// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
302b5(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni yongasu 'grib po zhes bya bar mi sems kyi/ 'on kyang de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo zhes bsams nA// 
302b6(brgyad stong): de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom zhing yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla
302b7(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du yongasu bsngo'o// de nas bcom ldan
303a1(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di yang gang lag/ 
303a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni de bzhin nyid do// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni rnam par
303a3(brgyad stong): 'phel ba 'am yongasu 'grib pa med do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa de dag dang / ldan pas rgyun mi 'chad par mang du gnas nA/ 
303a4(brgyad stong): de ltar na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye ba yin no// rab 'byor de ltar brjod du med pa'i don la 'phel bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su 'grib par yang mi
303a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// yid la byed pa de dag gis yongasu mi 'grib po// rab 'byor de ltar pha rol du phyin pa la 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur yongasu 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
303a6(brgyad stong): de ltar chos thams cad la yang 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur yongasu 'grib par yang mi 'gyu ro// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed
303a7(brgyad stong): pade lta bu dag gis gnas na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye ba yin no// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las// 
303b1(brgyad stong): stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcwo brgyad pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa// / bam po bcu bdun pa// / de nas
303b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang ci sems bskyed pas dang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
303b3(brgyad stong): po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on te sems bskyed pa slong mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
303b4(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa snga mas ni sems bskyed pa slad ma dang mi 'grogs// sems bskyed pa
303b5(brgyad stong): smad ma yang sems bskyed pa snga ma dang mi 'grogs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sogs par 'gyur/ 
303b6(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'bru mar gyi mar me 'bar ba'i
303b7(brgyad stong): me lce dang po phog pas snying po de tshig gam/ 'on te ma lce phyi ma phog pas snying po de tshig par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// btso
304a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das me lde dang po 'og pas snying po de tshig pa ma lags/ me lce dang po byung ba la marten par yang snying po de mi tshig go// bcom ldan 'das me lce slad mjog
304a2(brgyad stong): pas kyang snying po de ma tshig ste/ me lce slad ma phog pa la mo rten par yang snying po de mchog go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyams du sems
304a3(brgyad stong): ci snying po de yang tshig gam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshig lags so// bde bar gshegs pa tshig lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
304a4(brgyad stong): pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du sems bskyed pa dang pos kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
304a5(brgyad stong): par 'tshang mi rgya/ sems bskyed pa dang byo la ma rten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// sems bskyed
304a6(brgyad stong): pa phyi mas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu/ sems bskyed pa phyi ma la marten par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
304a7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya la/ sems bskyed pa de dag gis kyang ma yin/ semam bskyed pa de dag las gzhan pas kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang

304b7(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa de ma lags pa gzhan las kyang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

306a1(brgyad stong): kyis bka' bsngal/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid la sems yong dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan

306a5(brgyad stong): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/ gang de ltar spyod pa de zab mo la spyod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar spyod pa de ci la

306a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de ci la spyod/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa la spyod do// btse
306b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang don dam pa la spyod pa de mtshan ma la spyod dam/ rab
