373a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin du dben pa ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shin du dben pa cing bya
373a2(brgyad stong): phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub shin du dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'

375a6(brgyad stong): spyod pa yang su la yang sdug pa'am mi sdug pa ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang rnam par rtog pa mchis/

375b2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa gang mngon par sprul pa de 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
375b3(brgyad stong): kyis ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo zhes mi sems so// de ci'i smad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la rnam par rtog ma mchis pa'i snying du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de na

376a1(brgyad stong): chen po yang bgyi ba gang bgyi ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sgom par bgyi ba de yang bgyid la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang rnam pa

376b1(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

376b4(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag bor par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ mngon par sgrub
376b5(brgyad stong): bo'i sems can de dag ni phyag bya ba yin no// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing de ltar spyod kyang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs

382b7(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang gi ming dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjed pa yang
383a1(brgyad stong): ched du brjed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag yin no// rab 'byor gang dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog
383a2(brgyad stong): gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjesu slob pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / de rje su slob pa'i tshul du gnas pa rnams te/ rab 'byor 'di dag
383a3(brgyad stong): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen blo mi ldog pa rnams ma gtogs par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ming dang rus dang stogs dang kha dog
383a4(brgyad stong): dang gzugs yongasu spogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yangang ched du brjod pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
383a5(brgyad stong): chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad mi skye ba'o// zhes de ltar mos la nga dung mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob par gyur pa dang / 
383a6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes mos la chos thams la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob cing rten par ma gyur pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ni gnas pa
383a7(brgyad stong): 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi yang ming dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos
383b1(brgyad stong): smon cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod do// rab 'byor yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gi mingang/ 
383b2(brgyad stong): rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / chen du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa de dag ni nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas
383b3(brgyad stong): kyis spangs pa yin zhing / de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyis nyid la re bar bya ste/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung smon par 'gyuraro// 
383b4(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
383b5(brgyad stong): pa la spyod pa de dag gi ming dang rus dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs yongasu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa de dag kyang phyir
383b6(brgyad stong): mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyu ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa
383b7(brgyad stong): thos nas mos par byed cing / rmongs par mi 'gyur/ nem nur mi byed/ the tsom mi za ste/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
383'a1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyis bshad pa de bzhin gshegs no// zhes nas rgyas par mnyan cing / 'di sam du dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pad
383'a2(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs mi skyod pa dang / gang dag de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang dag tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
383'a3(brgyad stong): de dag gi thad nas rgyas par nyan to// snyam du sems bskyed par 'gyuraro// de dag gi thad nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan nas mos par 'gyur te/ de
383'a4(brgyad stong): dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la mos pa na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de bzhin du mos te/ de ltar mos pas phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas pa
383'a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos pa yang byed pa mang ba yin par bstan na/ gang dag mos par byed cing mos nas kyang de cing bzhin nyid
383'a6(brgyad stong): kyi don du gnas shing / de bzhin nyid kyi don du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi don du gnas shing / de bzhin nyid kyi don du bsgrubs nas kyang / de bzhin nyid la gnas par
383'a7(brgyad stong): gyur pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par gyur nas chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe de bzhin
383'b1(brgyad stong): nyid ma gtogs par chos gzhan dmigasum ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe chos gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag pa
383'b2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'ardzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang zhig chos 'di ston par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
383'b3(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gang gi tshe de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang yang dmigasu med na/ de'i tshe chos gang zhig de
383'b4(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang zhig chos 'di ston par 'gyur
383'b5(brgyad stong): zhes smra ba ni/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmig su mdo// rab 'byor re shig de bani ma
383'b6(brgyad stong): de nyid dmigasu med na/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'char
383'b7(brgyad stong): mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'am/ mngon par rdzogs pa 'chang 'bya bar 'gyur ba 'am
384a1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de ni gang yang dmig su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni chos mi ston to// rab 'byor chos gang bstan par bya ba'i/ 
384a2(brgyad stong): chos de yang dag su med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

384a4(brgyad stong): chen po dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid la chos gang yang gnas pa ma mchis la/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzog/ 
384a5(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar chos kyang gang yang ma mchis/ chos ston pa yang gang yang ma mchis pa dang / 'di la de zhum par mi 'gyur/ nem nur
384a6(brgyad stong): mi bgyid mongs par yang mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smra so// ko'u shi ka ga
384a7(brgyad stong): 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo 'di lta bu bshad pa la nem nur mi byed pa dang / rmongs par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni dka
384b1(brgyad stong): ba byed pa'o zhes zer la/ ko'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa na 'di la su zhig nem nur byed cing rmongs par 'gyur/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis
384b2(brgyad stong): gang dang gang gagad pa de dang de ni stong pa nyid las brtsams te bshad pas ci la yang thegs pa med do// 'di lta ste dper na bar snang la mnga' 'phangs na ci la yang thogs/ 
384b3(brgyad stong): pa med do// de bzhin du 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis chos ston pa ci la yang thogs pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad

384b6(brgyad stong): kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// ko'u shi ka gang khyod kyis de ltar bshad pa de de bzhin no// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ 'di skad du bshad
384b7(brgyad stong): cing 'di skad du bstan pade bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin no// chos smra ba yin no// chos kyi rje su 'thun pa'i chos lung bstan pas lung sten pa yin// 
385a1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gnas tan rab 'byor gang dang gang sbrebs par 'gyur ba de dang de ni/ ko'u shi ka stong pa nyid las brtsams te slob so//

385a7(brgyad stong): re shig mi dmigs na yang gang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi 'jigs pa'i nyid kyang re shig mi dmigs na/ yang gang mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba lta
385b1(brgyad stong): ga la yod/ chos kho na re shig mi dmigs na ya grang chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ko'u shi ka gnas rtan rab 'byor ni chos thad dben par gnas pa dang / chos than/

389a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni kun dga' bo ngas par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon sum du gyur pa

389a6(brgyad stong): mi byed/ 'gog par mi byed gnod par bya bar mi sems na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la bya ba byas pa yin par rig pa
389a7(brgyad stong): bya'o// kun dga' bo yang 'di ltar gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa slu bar mi 'gyur de lta bas na/ byang chub
389b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thang du de dge ba'i rgya ba bskyed pas nyan thos dang rang sangs
389b2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi don du rnam par smin pa sgrub par mi byed kyi/ kun dga' bo 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni phal cher shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la smra
389b3(brgyad stong): par bya ba yin no// kun dpa' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ci nas nub par mi 'gyur bar khyod la gang ngo // rjesu gtad ngo do// yi ge tsam yang nub par mi 'gyur
389b4(brgyad stong): bar zung shig/ tshangs shig/ ldogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ rab tu thon cig yun blor gnas par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo gal de khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du
389b5(brgyad stong): pa ma gtogs par chos gang ngas mngon sum du bshad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag thams cad bzung nas/ phyis rnams par chung gzan tam/ phyis gdang ngam/ brjed par byas na/

390a1(brgyad stong): ga/ bo yang khyod kyis gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzung nas/ phyis chud gzan cing btang ste/ brjed par byas na khyod kyis ngal bkur bstir ma byam// 
390a2(brgyad stong): mar ma byas/ brjed par ma byas/ mchod par ma byas/ ri mor ma byas/ bsnyen bkur ma byas/ kun dga' bo gang dag 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / lhar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

396a2(brgyad stong): chos rnams kyis chos rnams mi sheso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni shes pa po ma yin/ mthong po ma yin/ dgos pa byed nus pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir/ 
396a3(brgyad stong): zhe na/ kun dga'o na mkha' byed pa med pa'i phyir chos thang byed pa med pa'o// kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// kun dga' bo chos
396a4(brgyad stong): thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po ma yino// kun dga' byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod la cing // 
396a5(brgyad stong): chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob po// bslab
396a6(brgyad stong): pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol dum du phyin pa'i byang chub chen po rjesu thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
396a7(brgyad stong): bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ba slang pa 'di dag ni bslag pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog
396b1(brgyad stong): rab ces bya'o// bya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams
396b2(brgyad stong): chad la phan pa thams thob par byed pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba thob par byed pa'o// mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis gnas zhing sa
396b3(brgyad stong): rgyas kyis bsngags pa ste/ kun dga' bo bsgrub pa 'di la bslabs shing bslab pa 'di la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
396b4(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams kyis stong gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhabs kyi mthe bo gcig gis bteg ste sngar bzhag kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni 'ang
396b5(brgyad stong): snyam du stong gsung gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bteb pa'am bzhag par mi dgongaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gzhal du med grangs
396b6(brgyad stong): med pa'i yon tan dang ldan te/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la bslab nas/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang // 
396b7(brgyad stong): lngar byung ba'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa nyid rjesu brnye so// kun dga' bo 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi srab pa kyi snying long ba'i bsla
397a1(brgyad stong): dag thams cad las/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o/ 
397a2(brgyad stong): rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes
397a3(brgyad stong): bya'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad med pa'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi zad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni// 
397a4(brgyad stong): po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ma 'am zad pa'am/ mtha' ma bzung bar sems pa de ni/ nam mkha'i tshad ma 'am zad pa'am// 
397a5(brgyad stong): mtha' ma bzung bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma med pa'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa ni mi zad pa'o// / 
397a6(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mtha' med pa'o// kun dga' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ma 'am/ zad pa'am/ mtha' ma ni ma bshad de/ kun
397a7(brgyad stong): dga' bo yang ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs rnams la ni tshad ma dang 'brel pa yod kyi/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni tshad dang
397b1(brgyad stong): pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi go'i tshogs ni zhe yangadu phyin pa ma yin te/ kun dga' bos kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni cha
397b2(brgyad stong): ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// kun dba' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad med pa'o// kun dga' bos gsol/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci'i slang du bcom ldan 'das kyis
397b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshad ma ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi zad pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
397b4(brgyad stong): pas tshad ma ma bstan to// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi phyin pa dben pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshang ma ma brjod do// kun dga' bo dben pa'i chos la dben pa dmig su med/ 
397b5(brgyad stong): de'i tshad ma ltag la yod/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzhal du med pa'i phyir/ chang ma med cing tshang med pa yin no// kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus
397b6(brgyad stong): na de bzhin pa bye ba gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyis rab tu rtse
397b7(brgyad stong): 'a yin yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin na pa 'di zad pa'am yongasu zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs
398a1(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ra
398a2(brgyad stong): tu 'byed par 'gyur yang / da kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zad pa'am yongasu zad par 'gyur ba ma yino// kun dga' bo de ltar gzhal du med grangs med
398a3(brgyad stong): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhengs pa de dag kyang / kun dga'o / 
398a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zad pa'am yongasu zad par 'gyur ba ma yin// kun dga'
398a5(brgyad stong): bo ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasang yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab du phye ba yin pa
398a6(brgyad stong): kun dga'o shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zad pa'am yongasu zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zang par bya// 
398a7(brgyad stong): bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' zad por bya bar sems te/ kan dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi zad pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di
398b1(brgyad stong): snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnas 'di ni zab mo zhig yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis gnas 'di zhu'o snyam mo// de nas bcom
398b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi bas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
398b3(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi zang ba ste/ 'di lta sten mkha' mi zad pa'i phyir/ chos thang skye ba med pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
398b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ci ltar mngon par bsgrub par gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom
398b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs zang pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin dubyung
398b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du she byed rnams dang rnams par shes pa zang pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon
398b7(brgyad stong): par bsgrub par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang
399a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos ma rig pa mi zad pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin mngon par bsgrub pa bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sas
399a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos 'du byed mi zad pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi zad pa dang / mi dang gzugs mi zad pa dang / skye mched drug mi zad pa dang / reg pa mi zad pa dang / tshor ba mi zad pa dang / 
399a3(brgyad stong): sred pa mi zad pa dang / len pa mi zad pa dang / srid pa mi zad pa dang / skye ba mi zad pa dang / rga shi mi zad pa dang / mya ngan dang sde sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde
399a4(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'khrug pa mi zad pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rten cing 'brel
399a5(brgyad stong): bar 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba mtha' gnyis spangs pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar rnams par lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
399a6(brgyad stong): ba mtha' dang dbus med par rnam par lta ste/ rab 'byor gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la de ltar lta ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la
399a7(brgyad stong): 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung la lta ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
399b1(brgyad stong): thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod cing / rten
399b2(brgyad stong): ci'i 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par ltan de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ 'on kyang thang mkhyen pa tshad la gnas par 'gyur// 
399b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa de dag thams cad ni yid la byed
399b4(brgyad stong): de dang thabs ca mkhas pa 'di la ma rten pas mi shes so// ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas mi 'ad
399b5(brgyad stong): mngon par bsgrub pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya/ ci ltar mi zang mngon par bsgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten cing 'brel ba
399b6(brgyad stong): 'byung ba la rnam par blta zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa dang / 
399b7(brgyad stong): phyir ldog pa dang / phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni thabs mkhas pa 'di la ma rten pas phyir log go// phyir ldog go phyir ldog par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub
400a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi log pa dang / phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba de dag thams
400a2(brgyad stong): cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rten nas phyir ldog go// phyir mi ldog go// phyir ldo par mi 'gyur/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
400a3(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa la spyod pas mi zang mngon par bsgrub pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas/ shes rab
400a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par blta'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la
400a5(brgyad stong): rnam par lta bas gang yang rgyu med par 'byung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos gang yang rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa'am/ ther drug pa'am/ rnam par 'gyur ba med pa
400a6(brgyad stong): chos shin du yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // chos gang yang byed pa po'am/ tshor ba por yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i shes
400a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi zad par mngon par bsgrubs pas mngon par bsgrub cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing 'brel bar 'byub la rnam par lta ba yin no// 
400b1(brgyad stong): 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi zad pa mngon par bsgrubs pas mngon par bsgrub pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung / 
400b2(brgyad stong): bya la rnam par lta ba de'i tshe/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du tshor ba yin/ rnam par shes pa
400b3(brgyad stong): yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // mi rig pa yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs ma yin/ skye
400b4(brgyad stong): mchod drug ma yin/ reg pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa ma yin/ len pa ma yin/ srid pa ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ rga shi ma yin/ mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
400b5(brgyad stong): bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'o zhes yang dag par rje su mi mthong sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan yin no
400b6(brgyad stong): zhes yang dag par rjesu ma mthong // chos gang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'amag gzhan no zhes yang dag par rje su mi mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjesu mim
400b7(brgyad stong): mthong ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sos pa
401a1(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig pa
401a2(brgyad stong): ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na shin du mya ngan gyi zlog rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rang
401a3(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can yang shin mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyuro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci bdud sdig can cig
401a4(brgyad stong): mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa 'gyur ram/ 'on te bdud sdig can mang po shin du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dag 'on te stong gsum gyi sto
401a5(brgyad stong): tshon po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig can ci snyed mchis pa de dag tha~Md kyang de'i tshe mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
401a6(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

401b4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
401b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshul du'i khrims kyi pha rol du phyin/ 
401b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu ro// rab 'byor byang chub
401b7(brgyad stong): semam dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni pha rol du phyin pa drug po tha~Mng bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyuro// thabs mkhas pa thams
402a1(brgyad stong): ga cad bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa des ni bdud
402a2(brgyad stong): kyi las gang cung zad 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ rab tu shes nas rnam par spong bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor
402a3(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa thams cad yongasasu bzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// shes

402a5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par byed pa de'i tshe/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med
402a6(brgyad stong): grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ba zhes pa de dag la de dag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste/ shes rab
402a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las skyeso// snyam du bsam par bya'o// de ltar bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yang sems 'di ltar bskyed
402b1(brgyad stong): par bya ste/ ci ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang dag rje su brnyes pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang chos de dag kyang rje su thob par 'gyu'o// snyam ste/ 
402b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa pha rol du phyin pa la 'aspyod pas/ nyin gcig 'das kyi bar la tha na se gol btogs pa

402b4(brgyad stong): gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa can de bas na/ byang chub seMs rba sems dpe' chen po
402b5(brgyad stong): gang gis nyi ma gcig 'das kyi bar la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam du mngon par bsgrub na/ bsod nams ches mang du bskyed
402b6(brgyad stong): de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nyin gcig 'das kyi
402b7(brgyad stong): la chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa srid tsam yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod cing / sems bskyed pa 'di sems bskyed pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs
403a1(brgyad stong): ga thar byam yang sems bskyed pa 'ang kyi thog tha rjes su 'jug par byed pa la ci slos/ rab 'byung byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gshegs byas
403a2(brgyad stong): pas 'gro ba gang zhig la re bar bya zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 
403a3(brgyad stong): byang chub ma gtogs par 'gro ba gzhan du ngogs par mi bya ste/ de ni bskal ba med pa dang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur gyis/ mtho ris su skye bar re bar bya'o// der yang rje
403a4(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ sems can yongasu smon par byed par 'gyur
403a5(brgyad stong): ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam du yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha ro
403a6(brgyad stong): du phyin pa mngon par sgrub cing / sems bskyed pa 'di bskyed par byed pa'i yon tan 'di dag dang / phan yon 'di dag yin na/ gang zhig sems bskyed pa nyid thog thig rjesu 'jug par byed
403a7(brgyad stong): pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chos thams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skyod pa'i drung na/ da lta byang chub sems dpa'/ 
403b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po zhes bya tshangs par sbyang ba spyod pa bzhin no// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyang stong ba las/ me tog bkram bu'i le'u zhes
403b2(brgyad stong): bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'di ltar rje su rig par bya ste/ chos
403b3(brgyad stong): thams cad chags pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig
403b4(brgyad stong): par bya'o// chos tha~Md 'byung ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rjesu rig par bya'o// chos thaMd 'gyur ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par
403b5(brgyad stong): rjesu rig par bya'o// chos thaMd bdag med pa dang rnam par rig pa med par shes rab kyis rje su rdog pa pa sa// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rje su rig par bya'o// chos thad ming
403b6(brgyad stong): dang tha spang gdags pa tsam gyis brjod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par bya'o// tha snyad gdags pa yang gang la yang ma yin/ dang gis kyang ma yin gang yang rdzas
403b7(brgyad stong): gdags med do// chos dzad tha snyad med pa brjod du med pa slar med ga tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rjes su par bya'o// chos thams cad tshad ma med pa'i phyir
404a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par bya'o// gzugs tshang ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba tshad ma med
404a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa dang / 'du byed rnams tshad med pa dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa marjesu rig par bya'o// chos thams cad ma

404a4(brgyad stong): rang bzhin gyis yongasu bdag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig pa

404a6(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par bya'o// chos thang mi 'ong mi 'gro mi shes mi skyo shin du mi skye ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du
404a7(brgyad stong): phyin par rjesu rig par bya'o// bdag dang gzhan du mi lta ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rje su rig par bya'o// chos tha~Md 'phags pa dgra btso pa ra gyis yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ 
404b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rjes rig par bya'o// chos thang khur bor zhing ngur mi khyer ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad yul le
404b2(brgyad stong): cing phyogs med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rjesu rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor gzug ni rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid kyis yul dang phyogs med pa'o// 
404b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis yul dang phyogs med pa'o// chos thams cad /

405a2(brgyad stong): bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pas chos thams cad byang chub po zhes shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang //

405a4(brgyad stong): zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rje su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad byams pa la gnas pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa dang / dga' ba la gnas pa dang / btang snyos
405a5(brgyad stong): la gnas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rjesu rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshangs par gyur pas zhe sdang mi bskyed cing / zhe sdang tha~Md mi len pa'i phyir shes

411a1(brgyad stong): skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di skad ces de bzhin bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni sems can thams cad la sA
411a2(brgyad stong): bar byed 'dod sa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyiraro// zhes smra so// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra nges byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
411a3(brgyad stong): dul 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu legs so legs so zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus yang sgra de thos te/ rigs kyi bu khyod stong
411a4(brgyad stong): banyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par chos thams cad la mos pa bskyed la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yongasu spangs/ 
411a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / dngos po yongasu spang ba dang / sems can du lta ba yongasu spang bar bya'o// rigs kyis bu khyod kyis sdig de'i sgrogs po dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang
411a6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byang ba dang / ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa dang / dngos po med par chos rnams ston pa dag la
411a7(brgyad stong): khyod kyis snyen par bya/ gus par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgribs na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du chu
411b1(brgyad stong): pa 'am/ dge slong chos smras pa'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed
411b2(brgyad stong): par bya'o// khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ 'di bdag gis
411b3(brgyad stong): thos pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasgra
411b4(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang / ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi khyim pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// 
411b5(brgyad stong): dal baphun sum tshogs pa spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongasu nogs la dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes
411b6(brgyad stong): bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis dge
411b7(brgyad stong): slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu
412a1(brgyad stong): bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / s+tha dang dri ngang / ro dang reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang bsten pa dang / 
412a2(brgyad stong): spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub ste/ de dag chos smra ba nges zil gyis mnan nas thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing / bsten pa dang bsnyen par byed pa yang yod de/ 
412a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dang pa skyed par bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyis/ 'di ni
412a4(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas par she rab tu sheso// 'di ni gdul ba'i tshul gyis sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/ chos 'di dag la rten cing 'grogs te bsnyen
412a5(brgyad stong): bar byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa 'am/ sgrib pa med kyis/ skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos rnas
412a6(brgyad stong): kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste thams cad kun nas nyon mos pa ma yin/ rna bar byang ba ma yin
412a7(brgyad stong): no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa srogs med pa gso med pa/ skyes bu med pa gang zag med pa sgyu ma lta bu
412b1(brgyad stong): rmi lam lta bu/ swa brnyan lta bu mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing / chos smra ba'i rjesu 'brang na ring po mi thog
412b2(brgyad stong): par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khyod kyis bdud kyi las la bsoms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra bdag shes kyi
412b3(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu la brnyes par byed cing mi sems ni/ ro la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyi ba spro bar mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la
412b4(brgyad stong): gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyobs dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// zhes de smad kyang thos so// 'dir nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
412b5(brgyad stong): tu dus sgra ngos la rje su bstan pa 'di blangs nas/ shar phyogs ga la bder song ba dang / ring por ma phyin/ par de 'di snyam du bdag gis sgra de la ci srid du 'gro bar bya ma bri so// snyam
412b6(brgyad stong): du bsams nas de phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing chongs 'debs te/ mya ngan byed la smre zhing 'dug ste/ de 'di snyam dus phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gi bar du nyin mtshan 'da'
412b7(brgyad stong): bya'o// nyin mtshan gnyis sam gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga'am/ drug 'am/ nyin mtshan bdun yang 'da' bar bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du
413a1(brgyad stong): lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyen rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi skye/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ btung ba yid la bskyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ 
413a2(brgyad stong): grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyeng ngo snyam du bsams so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu lo la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na sdug bsngal
413a3(brgyad stong): ba dang / yi mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa nyid ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin
413a4(brgyad stong): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus kyang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan/ 
413a5(brgyad stong): gang yang ma byung ngo // rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig zhug
413a6(brgyad stong): nas leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshig de skad sA ba leg so lag so// ci ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongasu btsal ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin
413a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu btsal to// rigs
413b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di nyid dang / spro ba 'di nyid nyid dang / don du gnyer ba'ang nyid dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bu nyid kyi rje su 'brang zhing / shar phyogs nyid du song shig dang / 
413b2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po ches bdun gyi rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor ga 'obabs rim pa bdun dang / shing tal rim
413b3(brgyad stong): pa bdun gyis yongs bskor ba/ tshur dpag pa tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng pag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba bar
413b4(brgyad stong): gyi tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogasu bris pa lta bur blta na sdug pa/ phigs par gyur pa mnyam zhing mtshungs la/ skye bo dang khyogs kyi gzhon po dang rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas
413b5(brgyad stong): 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya bdag gis legs bsgrubs pa/ grong khyer gyi khor yug tu zhol ba'i phyir rin po che sa bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi bskor la/ rin po ches bdun gyi
413b6(brgyad stong): bzhin gyi ba de dag gi mda' rnams ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser las byas pa/ mtho ning tshang dang ldan pa mnga' yab thabs cad kyi rtse mo kyang rin po ches bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi shing
413b7(brgyad stong): skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkra ba'i shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mnga' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi theg ga byung bas/ mnga'
414a1(brgyad stong): gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang 'brel ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i grong khyer de gser gyi dril bu ga yer kha'i drabs khyebs te/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis
414a2(brgyad stong): bta ba na sa 'jam zhing snyam pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol me sna tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ 'jam
414a3(brgyad stong): zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong bdag 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sna des sems can de
414a4(brgyad stong): ngag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgu re spyod do// grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu rje su 'thun par 'bab pa'i chus yongasu gang zhing / chu ha cang yang mi grang ha cang yang mi dro bas dgang ba
414a5(brgyad stong): ngag yod do// chu de nga nyid la sems can rnams sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sgrub pa/ rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa'i gru dag yod de/ der sems can
414a6(brgyad stong): dag zhugs nas rtsi dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// chu de dag da thams cad kyang ud pa la dang / kum ta dang / pad ma dkar po de dag gis khyabs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la
414a7(brgyad stong): dri bzang po'i ngang dang ldan pa/ gzhan dgag gis kyang khyebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs de la den med pa gang yang med do// grong khyer
414b1(brgyad stong): de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ tha~Md kyang rin po sa bdun gyi rang bzhin rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang rdzi bu khor yug tu rgyang grags
414b2(brgyad stong): kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yong de/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi me tog ud pal dang / ku mu ta ngang / pad mar dkar po rnam par bkra zhing b.lan
414b3(brgyad stong): sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de dag byebs shing / ud pa la dang / ku muta dang / pang ma dkar po bzang po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing ti'i 'khor lo tsam ste/ dri ba
414b4(brgyad stong): ba sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon por ston pa/ sngon por snang ba/ ser po kha dog ser po ser por ston pa/ ser por snang ba/ dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar por ston pa/ dmar por
414b5(brgyad stong): snang ba/ dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar por ston pa/ dkar por snang bdag yod do// rdzing bu de dag thams cad na ngang dur dang / khrung khyung dang / ka ra NA ka dang / sa ra sa sgra 'byin pa
414b6(brgyad stong): dge yong ngo // skyed mos tshal de dag mthams cad kyang ngayir bya ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med de/ 'di ltar yun ring por sems can dngag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / 
414b7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi tshul la gus par byed pa rjes 'gro ba'i thos pa dang/ sems pa legs par rtogs pa/ yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi
415a1(brgyad stong): las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no// de la rigs kyi bu grong khyer spos dang ldan pa de'i bzhi mngon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
415a2(brgyad stong): kyi khang pa rin po ches bdun las byas pa/ kho ra yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongasu bskor
415a3(brgyad stong): ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na khang pa'i long spyod pa dang nye bar longs spyod pa dag rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan las bral zhes bya ba
415a4(brgyad stong): dang / me rtogs tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang 'di lta ste/ rdzing bu bzang po zhes
415a5(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog zhes bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde mchog ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab
415a6(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya ba brgyad brgyad yod do// yang rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser gyi rang bzhin/ ngos gnyis pa ni dngul gyi rang bzhin/ ngos gsum pa ni be du r+ya'i rang bzhin/ ngos
415a7(brgyad stong): bzhin pa ni shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'og gis gzhi ni kar ka ta na'i rang bzhin la gser bye ma bangal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang them skas them pa rin po che'i rang bzhinas
415b1(brgyad stong): tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgya brgyad yod de/ them skus de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skye so// rdzing bu de dag thams
415b2(brgyad stong): cad kyi chu ni me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu tra dang / pad ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khyebs shing / ngang dur dang / khyud khrung dang / kA ra N+Da dang / sa ra sa rnams skad 'byin to// rdzi nga bu de dag
415b3(brgyad stong): gi kho ra yug tu me tog go shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ me tog gi shing de dag la rlung bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de dag thaMd kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi
415b4(brgyad stong): drir phyogs shing / kha dog dang ldan dri dang ldan/ ro dang ldan reg dang ldano// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa/ bud med drug
415b5(brgyad stong): khri brgyad stong dang ldan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan dang ldan zhing dbang du gyur pa ste/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang / bud med gzhan
415b6(brgyad stong): dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan nas dbang gyur te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod/ 
415b7(brgyad stong): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de dus de srid du 'khor nas dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing / dga' mgur spyod par byed cing de na dus gsum du
416a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
416a2(brgyad stong): chos 'phags kyi khri ga ser gyi rkang pa dang dngul byi rkang pa dang / be dUr+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa gtsugs pa/ shing bal gting bstan par tshangs can bting ba/ steng snying po ca
416a3(brgyad stong): byas pa/ ka shi ka'i gting ba/ 'phang du dpag tshad byed yod pa bshams te/ steng bar snang la yang gos kyi bla re mu tig gi brgyan pa bris pa la ci 'di legs par gnas sam snyam pa leg
416a4(brgyad stong): par gnas pa sna tshogs pa rnam par smin pas lhan cig tu mnyam par rab tu 'dzin par byed cing / sa phyogs de khor yug tu yang me tog kha dog sA lnga pa dag mngon par gtor rab tu
416a5(brgyad stong): gtor/ yang dag par rab tu gtor bar byed la/ ci ltar yang 'di chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gus pas sa phyogs

416a7(brgyad stong): bu sems can de dag ni de ltar chos la gus par byed cing / chos rnams la brten pa dang / dad pa dang ldan pa dang ba dang / dad pa skyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
416b1(brgyad stong): chos 'phags kyi drung du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa can to// de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / sreg chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya
416b2(brgyad stong): stong phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni lung 'bogs/ la la ni kha ton byed/ la la ni yi ger 'bri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtog par byed de/ sems can de dag thang
416b3(brgyad stong): kyang log par mi lhung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang lhas phyir mi ldog pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
416b4(brgyad stong): 'phags de'i drung du song shig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyed kyi dge ba'i grwanyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag
416b5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzeng bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dpa' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu des
416b6(brgyad stong): kyang ston da ltar khyod ci ltar tshol ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par skyed pas song shig
416b7(brgyad stong): dang / ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos par 'gyu ro zhes gsung so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos pas dga' mgu yid
417a1(brgyad stong): rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste dper na skye bu med 'u dug can zhig gis log na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi/ gang dag du
417a2(brgyad stong): rngu 'di las spel cing / bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa dag gis nam rnyes snyam sems pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
417a3(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de thos par byed cing chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ni
417a4(brgyad stong): mthong snyam du sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
417a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston pa thos so// thos nas kyang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi spro du ma mngon
417a6(brgyad stong): du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos tha~Md kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa las
417a7(brgyad stong): nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thad snang
417b1(brgyad stong): bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang chos thad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par
417b2(brgyad stong): gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thaMd bdag gi dngos po mi bsgrub pa zhes
417b3(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa ni
417b4(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes
417b5(brgyad stong): song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sna dang tshig dang yi ge 'bru sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin gyi
417b6(brgyad stong): tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i tshig
417b7(brgyad stong): dang lag 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thang
418a1(brgyad stong): gal sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs
418a2(brgyad stong): rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ti
418a3(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyingasu nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i
418a4(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis mnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang rnam par bral ba
418a5(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa me zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur bcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting

424a2(brgyad stong): du lus yongasu btang bar bya ba yin na/ mang ma po'i phyir lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya che zhing phul du byung ba yongasu brjod pa ci lta bar bdag kyang 'dod ci bzod

424a4(brgyad stong): bai dUr+ya'am/ dngul lam/ mur gar pa 'am/ lo haM ha tA ra ka'am/ shel lam me tog gam/ bdug pa'am dri 'am/ phreng ba'am byug pa'am/ phye ma'am gos sam/ gdugs sam/ 
424a5(brgyad stong): rgyal mtshan nam/ dril bu'am/ bdan nam/ mar me khyod ci dgos pa de dang de khyod la byin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs
424a6(brgyad stong): te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la bder dong la bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba
424a7(brgyad stong): phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes smra so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u cha bya mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa'
424b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag du'i mdun du 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar bu'i yi dam la brtan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos don du gnyer ba 'dzin
424b2(brgyad stong): leg so leg so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa shes rab kyi
424b3(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs khas pa yongasu zhus pas chos rin po che shin du thob nas bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rig
424b4(brgyad stong): kyi bud la snying dang khrag dang / rus pa dang rkang gis bya ba med kyang khyed sang pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mchog slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la
424b5(brgyad stong): mchog ci lta bu zhig sbyin par bya zhes smra so// des de la smras pa/ brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa yang dag bdag la stsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi
424b6(brgyad stong): bu yul 'di la ni nga'i nus pa yod pa ma yin te/ yang yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ mchog gzhan spongs shig/ rtag dus smra
424b7(brgyad stong): pa/ bdag gis lus yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la ni lnga'i dbang po brgya byin khyod brtson pa chung bar gyis shig lha'i dbang po nga'i lus 'di la bdag nyid kyis / 
425a1(brgyad stong): pa'i byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// lha'i dbang po de bgang gis bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dang
425a2(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo ba med pa mkhyen na/ bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag
425a3(brgyad stong): gi lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang / de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pas byang chub sems dpa
425a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi ba ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang / nad med pa dang gnod pa med par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig
425a5(brgyad stong): can yang spobs pa med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul lan glan par spobs pa ma skyes de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo
425a6(brgyad stong): des byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod tshur she/ bdag gi khyim gang na yod pa der 'dong ngo // bdag gis la mi'i drung nas nor blangs te/ 
425a7(brgyad stong): 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir gang gis shes rab kyi la la rol du phyin pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags des
425b1(brgyad stong): yang bkur bstir bya ba khyod la sbyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong nga por gyi bu mo de dang 'grogs nas/ de'i rang gi khyi ma gang na yod pa der dong ste
425b2(brgyad stong): phyin nas sgo drung du sdud do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de rang gi khyim du phyin nas pa ma la 'di skad ces smra so// yang yum gser dang dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gos dang me tog
425b3(brgyad stong): bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / jil bu dang bdan dang / rol mo'i cha byed sna tshogs dag bdag la stsol cig/ bang
425b4(brgyad stong): kying khyod kyis stsal pa'i g.yog me bu lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig bgyir gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub ses
425b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur zhing der bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos
425b6(brgyad stong): rnams rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smra so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba de su zhig de da lta gang
425b7(brgyad stong): na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag
426a1(brgyad stong): par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas de chos 'tshal ba'i slang du bdag nyid btso
426a2(brgyad stong): la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur ba sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ 
426a3(brgyad stong): de'i lus nyo ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed cing / ma rnyed pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas mi dga' bar sems shing mchi ma phyung nas mchis pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i
426a4(brgyad stong): khye'u'i gzugasu bsgyur bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bas mi dga' bar sems shing mchi ma phyung nas gnas pa ci nyes/ de la smras pa/ bdag nyid
426a5(brgyad stong): 'tshong bar 'dod na bdag gi de nyo ba yang ma rnyed do// bram ze'i khye'u gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu
426a6(brgyad stong): dus smras pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur bsti bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas
426a7(brgyad stong): kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang / bram ze'i khye'i'u gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni da mi 'dod de/ kyang 'on kyang
426b1(brgyad stong): ngamachod sbyin zhig bye ba der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / rkabang ba dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu nges yi ma gsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas
426b2(brgyad stong): de mtshon rnon po thogs de bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzags ba rA sha med par gtogs te/ rus pa gcig tu rtsig pa'i drang du song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste rus
426b3(brgyad stong): dang kang sbyin no snyam nas rigs kyi bu de khrag gzugs pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du 'gyid do// mi 'di ci'i slang du 'di lta bur ba / 
426b4(brgyad stong): nyid lan tsho ga 'gyid sam te/ de'i thad du bdag mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltang bdag nyid kyi lus kyi zag gzags pa'i ngas ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bas
426b5(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces mchi ste/ bu mo bram ze'i le 'ung la khrag dang / snying dang rus pa dang rkang sbyin no// do na'i'abrir zhe na/ nga ni dbul te nga la nor gzhan ci yang med do// zhes mche'o bdag gis
426b6(brgyad stong): khyod la nor gyis zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / des bdag la 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags byang chub seMs
426b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bstir bya'o// zhes mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi ris sam/ yon tan bya
427a1(brgyad stong): khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ des bdag la 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med pa

427a3(brgyad stong): nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di du bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di shin du 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'di lta bur rang gi lus kyi bar du yang mi gnas par spro
427a4(brgyad stong): ba na dka' ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongasu gtong na/ bdag cag la long spyod gang dag mnga' zhing rgya che ba dag yod na/ ci
427a5(brgyad stong): phyir bdag cag chos la mchod pa mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam na/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu
427a6(brgyad stong): khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i srog 'phrog pa'i tshul gyi na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod don gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir

427b1(brgyad stong): bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongasu brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa de lta bu'i chos dag bdag gis kyang rdzogs par brgya
427b2(brgyad stong): zhes bgyis na/ e 'a sum gyis kyang dkor gyi phung po chen po de bgral stsal ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang ldan cig tu 'babs pa byang chub sems dpa'
427b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bgyi'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyang stong ba/ bam ze 'i shu bzhi pa/

428a8(brgyad stong): rta babs bdun yod pa/ 'bas rim pa bdun dang / shing rta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yong pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa bde
428b1(brgyad stong): b.lo legs pa/ me dang skye bo mang pos gang ga bar gyi tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogasu dris pa lta bur lta na sdug pa/ phigs par gyur pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pa skye ba dang / khyogs kyi gzhon pa dang rkang /

428b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags gal ba der dang / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rin po// 
428b8(brgyad stong): che sna bdun gyis rang bzhin las byas pa tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste khang pa brtsegs pa de'i gru bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur/ 
429a1(brgyad stong): te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do// 'dug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mcheng bar bya ba'i phyir a ka ru nug

429a5(brgyad stong): kyang mthong ste lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang lha'i can dan gyi phye ma dang lha'i gser gyi bye ma dang lha'i dngul gyi phye ma ngag gi khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'ther mngon
