431a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags gal ba der song sngo phyin nas/ chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phagasal me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng
431a5(brgyad stong): ba dang / byug pa dang bye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang ba dan dag dang / tsan ni phye ma dang / gser dngul las byas pa'i me tog dag gis gtor mngon par gtor mngon
431a6(brgyad stong): par ra gtor to// lnga'i sil snyan dag kyang yang dag par rab dkrol lo// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na me tog gi khang pa brtsegs
431a7(brgyad stong): bzhig tu 'gyur to// gser dang dngul las byas pa'i me tog dang // kha dogs tshogs pa'i me tog de dag na mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar gyur to// de'i chos gos dang / gos rin po che dag
431a8(brgyad stong): bar snang la rin po sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug gyur to// byang chub sems sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ru dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la gsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis
431b1(brgyad stong): byang chub mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul de lta bu mthong ste/ mthong nas de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar den 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
431b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di rdzu 'jal che zhing / 'di ltar mthu tshil 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba stong pa nyid na yang rdzu 'phrul rnam
431b3(brgyad stong): 'phrul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu me la sogs pa bu mo lnga
431b4(brgyad stong): brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas/ tshogs pa de dag thams cad dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa
431b5(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
431b6(brgyad stong): rgyas su gyur cipa/ byang chub sems de nga'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thos
431b7(brgyad stong): par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkur bstir byed pa dang / bla na mar byed pa de bzhin du shes rab
431b8(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa la bkur byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkur bstor byed pa dang / bla mar byed par shog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
431b9(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'alegs ci lnga mang dag par son pa bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang ste ba mang po la yang dag par yin par gyur cig ci lngar byang chub semos dpa' sems
432a1(brgyad stong): chos pags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongasu rdzogs pa de gzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas
432a2(brgyad stong): pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog shig ces smra so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ 
432a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur ba sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags
432a4(brgyad stong): kyi rkang pa la mgo bo rnams kyis mngon du phyag 'tshol nas zhes byed cing / thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
432a5(brgyad stong): chos 'phag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtagau dus 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu 'di na bdag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshol zhing 'brog dgon par
432a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa na/ rigs kyi bu shAr phyog su song shib dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin+d+ha pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes smra thos te/ bdag gis sgra de las yang dag par sman pa de thos nas/ shar
432a7(brgyad stong): phyog gal ba de legasu mchis nas 'di snyam du bas ma t+te/ bdag gi sgra de la ni snying gcig mchi bar bgyi/ su'i drung du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par gyur pa ya
432a8(brgyad stong): ngog par 'gro ba snga rjes pa la bdag gis ma dris mi skams// des bdag myong me bde zhing shin du gdung bar gyur nas sa~M gas de nyid du nyin mtshon bdun 'das ka/ de lar shin du gdung
432b1(brgyad stong): bas zas la sems pa na mi byung gi gzhan du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te ci srid tu mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di su las mnyan
432b2(brgyad stong): pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de las ma dris so snyam po // de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig byung ste/ de 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga
432b3(brgyad stong): brgya ra ri mo gyis song dang / grong khyer sros ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshes 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sten cing 'chad pa mthong bar
432b4(brgyad stong): 'gyu ro zhes gsungs te/ de nas bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu rab rgya chen po de nyid kyis khyab par gyur na sA/ sa
432b5(brgyad stong): phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thos so// de bdag gis thos pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis
432b6(brgyad stong): na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs byung ba mdzad pa leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so leg so// 
432b7(brgyad stong): khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongasu rdzogs par byas/ 
432b8(brgyad stong): so zhes/ de bzhin gshegs de dag gis bdag la shin du legs par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar
433a1(brgyad stong): mdzad nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bdag kyang de nas ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin
433a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang dag gis 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phrogs ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon
433a3(brgyad stong): par shes pa lnga thob pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la bgyi ba bgyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sbran pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la shin du bslabs pa yin te/ de
433a4(brgyad stong): bdag la de bzhin gshegs de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag tu gang du bzhud pa'i don 'di ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyu ro snyam du bsams te/ bdag
433a5(brgyad stong): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sgra thos pa las ci ltar gdams pa de ltar sher phyogs ga la ba der mchis te/ mchis nAs kyang rgyang rid+den+das gdag gis 'phags pa/ 
433a6(brgyad stong): chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa rtse gcig par yid la byed pa'i bod ba de lta bu skyes par gyur to// 
433a7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces 'dri na/ rigs kyi bu ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs
433a8(brgyad stong): de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa 'chal cing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / mi 'brel bar 'gyur ba ring bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa bdag la bshad
433b1(brgyad stong): du gsol// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinu pa brgyad stong pa las// / nag du'i le'u zhes byas sum cuba'o// / de sad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems pab
433b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rdul 'od skad ces snga so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byen/ gang
433b3(brgyad stong): yang ma bzhud cing / de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba grang
433b4(brgyad stong): smin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba shes pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtho' gang yin de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// ri
433b5(brgyad stong): kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bcil ba bzhin la ni 'ong 'gro ba shes pa medade/ 
433b6(brgyad stong): lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni de zhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
433b7(brgyad stong): pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu mkha'i khams la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa
433b8(brgyad stong): sre / na ma pa'i khams gang yin pa do ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan na mong rjen khri gas kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin
434a1(brgyad stong): kyid pa dzin pa dang / chas rnams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang 'i nub dang/ ba nAg gas pa'i de bzhin cing dang ming ba di dag ni de bzhin cid gan // rAgs rdu
434a2(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid la ni la ni gnyis su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lnga ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'od ste
434a3(brgyad stong): ste dper na/ skyes bu sos ka'i zla ba tham sos ka'i tsha ba nyi mgung gi dus la bab pa'i che/ spyi rgyu g.yo ba mthong ba la 'dir chu ba tung ngo snyam nas/ de gang du chu mthong ba de dang der
434a4(brgyad stong): rgyu ga na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ shar logs kyi rgya mtsho chena'o me lho phyogs sam/ nub phyogs sam/ byang phyogs las chu gang nas 'ongs chung gang du song / rtag tu dus smra
434a5(brgyad stong): pa/ rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu de nyi mo sa gtungs shing byis pa'i rang po zhe na can shes rab 'chal
434a6(brgyad stong): 'i rang bzhin can gyis smig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis na'ang chur 'du shes skyes kyi yang de la tshun rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos 'phags kyi swA stas pa/ 
434a7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi phu de dru bzhin no// de de banan te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang mu dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs samamA sgrar mngon par chags pa de ni/ de banan
434a8(brgyad stong): gagenas pa la phyin pa ma btsud pa rig go/ gang de zhin ga gags pas byin pa 'am bzung pa 'jog pa de ga zims ca rten gyis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab
434b1(brgyad stong): rang bzhin pa zhes du ste dbyer na snas bu rgyu tu myed pal rgyu 'dugs bskyed pa rnyan nan/ rgyu su shin dge pa smra bas / 
434b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos nyid kyi sgra'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am bzhud pa med do// 
434b3(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma byed pa'i sprul pa'i glang po che'i cho gas sam/ rta'i tshogs sam shing rta'i tsho gas sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de
434b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la yang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ga ma gnyis ma
434b5(brgyad stong): gsum 'am bzhi 'am/ lnga'am drug gam/ dun nam brgyad dam/ dgu'am bcu 'am/ nyi shu'am sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu'am lnga bcu 'am/ brgya 'am de las lhag pa zhig mthong
434b6(brgyad stong): b.las sad pa dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu dza sam+me du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dge gang nas byen/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang
434b7(brgyad stong): drung rlung / rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam ma tshes gang yang yongasu grub pa re shes pa mi ga 'o// rmi la ma ni rdzun te yang dag pa ma lagaso/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs
434b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu di bzhin to/ ches paras ca na bcom ldan 'das kyi mi lams bu'o nas gsungs// rigs kyi bu gang su ngag di bzhin gshegs pa sa thams cad rmilam la bur bam ngas su
435a1(brgyad stong): lta bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin
435a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud pa rtog pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor bar 'gro ba drug po 'di dag
435a3(brgyad stong): thams cad du dong ba 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring
435a4(brgyad stong): du gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes
435a5(brgyad stong): pa de dag ni chos gang la yang 'ong ba'am 'am 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am 'gag par mi rtog go// gang dag chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 'gag par mi rtog pa de
435a6(brgyad stong): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rab tu she so/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rab tu shes pa de dag ni de dag bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par mi rtog go// 
435a7(brgyad stong): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar spyod pa ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o// 
435a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don mod par za ba ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnaso// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i
435b1(brgyad stong): nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs// lho nas ma yin nub nas ma yin/ byang nas ma yin/ phyogs mtshams nas ma yin/ steng dang 'og nas ma yin/ phyogs rgyu gang
435b2(brgyad stong): nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sems drug gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas rmyi che chen po'i nang nas rin po che de dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkun
435b3(brgyad stong): gzhi la rag las pa yin te brten nas 'byung ngo // rin po che de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang mi 'pho mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen de dag yod na rin po che dag rab tu 'byed
435b4(brgyad stong): do// rkyen de dag med na rin po che dag rab tu dbye ba yang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku yongs grub pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas
435b5(brgyad stong): kyang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nA kAng du yang ma bzhud blo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sutu med pa yang ma yin te sngon gyi spyad pas yongs brub pa yin pas rgyal ra
435b6(brgyad stong): las brkyen la rag las pa/ sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa las byung ba yin zhing de ni phyog bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na rang yod pa ma yin no// 'on kyang rkyen chos med
435b7(brgyad stong): nasu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par grub pa mI snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bi wa ma gI sna byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gags
435b8(brgyad stong): pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro gang na yang mi 'pho ste/ rgyu dang rkyen tshegs pa la rten nas byung ga rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa 'di lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la bden/ lpags pa la / 
437a1(brgyad stong): rgyud la brten/ yu ba la brten/ shing bu la brten/ rgyud rten la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas 'di ltar pi wang de las sgra byung ste/ rgyu la rag la rkyen la reg las
437a2(brgyad stong): nga'i sgra de yang pi wang gi theg pa las ma byung / lpags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / u ba las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud brten las mabyung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las
437a3(brgyad stong): sgyu ma byung mod kyi 'on kyang de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang gdagaso// sgra de 'gegs pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku
437a4(brgyad stong): yongasu 'grub pa yang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sbyor ba du mas yongasu grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtse gcig gis
437a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang ma byon to// rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang
437a6(brgyad stong): du yang mi band de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs de dag byon pa dang btsud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chung
437a7(brgyad stong): par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang chun chud de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag
437a8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro// yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang
437b1(brgyad stong): banud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yos pa chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rteran gyi khams 'ang thams can bltas chen po bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa
437b2(brgyad stong): drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ mgul rab tu 'gul kun du rab tu 'gug gtses rab tu garos kun dur bdu gsos/ ldog rab tu ldeg kun tu sdug 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun du
437b3(brgyad stong): gas/ rjemachem rab tu rje mche makun du rab tu tshe ni marje ma/ bum rab tu thun nu kun du rab tu ba 'ur rdur te/ bdud kyi ga nas thams cid kyang dkribs shings kyi skong ra gyur/ 
437b4(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nag gso tshal ci spyod pa yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag
437b5(brgyad stong): gal ba de logasu rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing me tog gi che ra chen po dag kyang 'bab po/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / 
437b6(brgyad stong): rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dag gi phyog su lnga'i nan ngan gyi
437b7(brgyad stong): dang lha'i matog kyis 'brir mngon par mthor mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing / tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu leg so legs so// rigs kyi bla khyod kyi mthus dang ba ga cag gis kyang / 
437b8(brgyad stong): sems can gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i sa la gnas blta ba dang bcas pa thams cad la mngon par non pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa den dam pa las byung ba'i gtam
438a1(brgyad stong): bstan pa thos so zhes zer ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras
438a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bus chen po g.yos pa 'jig rten gyi du byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ ring
438a3(brgyad stong): bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi byon mi btsud pa bstan pa 'di khyod kyis dris te bdag gis bstan pas/ srog chags stong phrag brgyad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thos par
438a4(brgyad stong): gyur pa dang / srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
438a5(brgyad stong): med cing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog du dga' ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu rgya chen po dang lnga par gyur te/ gang
438a6(brgyad stong): dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa'i bstan pa 'di dris pas sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas par
438a7(brgyad stong): panog dag gis rnyed pa mchog tu legs par snyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par
438a8(brgyad stong): ra pa sa/ bla na med pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdag slar yang the tsom mi 'jug go/ bdag ni the tsom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
438b1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas/ ta la bdun tsam du na mkha' la 'phags nas/ ta la bdun tsam na 'duge ste/ 'di ltar bdag
438b2(brgyad stong): sh+tsam+bu mkha' la 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bsti bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byi gyis
438b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag du mngon par 'phags mthong ste/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag byin te/ 'di
438b4(brgyad stong): skudu rigs kyi bu khyod kyis lha'i me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur ba sti byed pas bkur bstir bgyis shing / 
438b5(brgyad stong): gas kyi bu 'drin dus khyod yongs su gzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng srog chags stong phra mang po'i don te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams
438b6(brgyad stong): phyir n-i smin khyed sngo bar byed pa de lta'i bskol bu gzha'adu med gla sa meng bar spro bar byed ni ga rgya chen go b+hair bar byed pa sems can dag ni rnyeng parang / 
438b7(brgyad stong): mi smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems / gdus lta rnams kyi dang 'i rkyen gyi byung nas mi
438b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
439a1(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bka' ste/ tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang zham ring bgyi ba'i skad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul
439a2(brgyad stong): lo zhes smras te/ des bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo
439a3(brgyad stong): lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba
439a4(brgyad stong): 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu yang dang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur bstir
439a5(brgyad stong): bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa
439a6(brgyad stong): bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag gal te khyed nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas na bdag nyid byin cig dang / de ltar na bu mo
439a7(brgyad stong): khyed ngas blang ngo // bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rje su 'thun par 'jug go// khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci dang ci 'dod par bya bar
439a8(brgyad stong): bdag nyid 'bulo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing
439b1(brgyad stong): rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la rim gro dang zham ring bya ba'i phyir phul to/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni g.yog mo 'di dag
439b2(brgyad stong): 'bul zhing / shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ 
439b3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'byor pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i
439b4(brgyad stong): sems de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na sa
439b5(brgyad stong): chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa nyan nus te/ rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
439b6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di lta bu'i tshul dang / 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag
439b7(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa yongasu dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
439b8(brgyad stong): po chos 'phags kyi tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya bong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge
440a1(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blang nas rigs kyi bu na gtu ngul smar byino// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
440a2(brgyad stong): bstan las langs te bdag gis khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag chos
440a3(brgyad stong): 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mi chal 'di ni ma legs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bdag gzung
440a4(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste chos sngon du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar bya'o zhes sems par gyur to// de nas byang chub ses
440a5(brgyad stong): dpa'o sems dpa chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phyug gzham
440a6(brgyad stong): du med grangs med pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rta
440a7(brgyad stong): tudu yang lo bdun gyi bar dug nyid dang rmugs pa med par/ spyod lam rnam pa gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de/ lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtag pa ma byung / gnod
440a8(brgyad stong): sems kyi rtag pa ma byung / rnam par 'tsho ba'i rtog pa ma byung / rol rgyam pa ma yin/ sems kyi rnam par rtag pa ma byung ste/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems
440b1(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin las nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag gis kyang khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos sngon por 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
440b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri bshams na/ bdag gi sa phyogs 'di chag chag ma btab kyis/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen
440b3(brgyad stong): chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa rab tu 'gyur ba der legs par byung bar bya/ me tog sna tshogs mngon par bkram mo snya mo// 
440b4(brgyad stong): dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus byangs
440b5(brgyad stong): byed de/ bya ba thams cad de'i rjes su 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lnga'i sgra dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sems
440b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags da ste zhag bdun nas ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyu ro zhes thos so// 
440b7(brgyad stong): nas byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu dga' mgu zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon rgya
440b8(brgyad stong): bu mo la sog pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po chos bdun gyi rang bzhin du sham so// de nas bu mo ngag gis rang rang gi bla gos lus las phung // 
441a1(brgyad stong): bla gos lnga brgya po de dag stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
441a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan bshams pa la bu mo de dag thams cad dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// de nas byang chub
441a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sa phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rtag tu ngu de mo chu ma rnyed nas
441a4(brgyad stong): sems mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal te/ yid mi bde bar gyur cing sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / gang gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par bya ba'i
441a5(brgyad stong): phyir/ gang gis sa phyogs der chag chag 'debs pa'i chu de thams cad kyang mi snang nyid du byas pas kun du chu btsal na ma rnyed de// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
441a6(brgyad stong): tu ngu 'di snyam du ma la bdag gi lus phug la phrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'ang ni rdul che ste/ sa phyogs 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung
441a7(brgyad stong): ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la log na mi rung gis/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa'i chos can 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di
441a8(brgyad stong): lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni bla'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis mang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor zhing / bdag gi lus stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i gan su
441b1(brgyad stong): zhig pa ni 'di lta bu'i gnas sam/ chos yongasu bzung ba'i phyir ni ma yin te/ 'dod pa de lta bu'i chos can la zhig pa yin nosam du bsam so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
441b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu sas de ltar bsams nas/ mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus kun du phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de thams cad du chag chag bdab pa/ byang chub sas
441b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag tha~Md kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus lug nas rang rang gi
441b4(brgyad stong): khrag gis sa phyogs de dag thaMd du chag chag btab ste/ de dag la bdud sdig can des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i glags gang du rnyed par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
441b5(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngu dang bu mo de dag thams cad sems gzhan du gyur pa med do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
441b6(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngu 'di tsam du chos 'dod pa dang / ci tsam du mying ma la brten pa dang / ci tsam dugo ma chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams la mi lnga bu dang / bran mong
441b7(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
441b8(brgyad stong): yongasu dpag tu med pa las sems can thar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ngo mtshor to snya mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag
442a1(brgyad stong): thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsanA dan gyi chu dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khab pa dang ldan pa de'i dris sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tsha
442a2(brgyad stong): bar yongs su khyab po// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu legs legaso// rigs kyi
442a3(brgyad stong): bu khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa leg so// khyod kyis chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba yang legs te/ rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtse
442a4(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
442a5(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub so// zhes smra so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'
442a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi sman ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni legs par byas/ chag chag ni legs par btab na/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs
442a7(brgyad stong): 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad cing chos kyi stan la 'dug pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyid par
442a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man da ra ba 'di dag
442b1(brgyad stong): khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing chos kyi khril 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces smras
442b2(brgyad stong): na sau/ des de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba lha'i khal sdong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangaste/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs ngor
442b3(brgyad stong): me tog bkram pa byaso// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
442b4(brgyad stong): lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las langs te chos kyi stan gang na song ba der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'jug ste/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs bskor cing mdun gyis blta
442b5(brgyad stong): nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu/ 
442b6(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta thob bo/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
442b7(brgyad stong): 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa na 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pa
442b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom pa med pa nyid pas
443a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rlom pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'angs pa med pa cing pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa meng pa cing ngo // chos thams cad ro gcig pa nying pas
443a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi
443a3(brgyad stong): pha rol du phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
443a4(brgyad stong): du phyin pa mu med po nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid
443a5(brgyad stong): do// na mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa mu med pa nyid do// 
443a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// 
443a7(brgyad stong): sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes
443a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rnam pa shes pa'i khams mu med pas/ shes rab
443b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dris pa nyid pas/ shes rab

443b4(brgyad stong): thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba yino// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag
443b5(brgyad stong): tu ngu de ltar 'jug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po skyes par gyur to// chos thad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yog
443b6(brgyad stong): bo med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin po// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
443b7(brgyad stong): ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting rje 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
443b8(brgyad stong): 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ring bzhin
444a1(brgyad stong): mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
444a2(brgyad stong): shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes
444a3(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i
444a4(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / chos tha~Md ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thaMd migasu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rna pa 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces
444a5(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos tha~Md byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thaMd bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen
444a6(brgyad stong): po rtag tu dus de lta bu la sog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stong brgyad stong phrag drug cu rab tu thob pa gyur to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las// 
444a7(brgyad stong): chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' seMs rnga chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sngo brgya
444a8(brgyad stong): phrag drug bcu bo mthag tu/ shar phyogs dang phyogs dang / nu phyogs dang byang phyogs dag mtshams dong/ 'og dang gleng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten stong gsu rtse slong chen gyi
444b1(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung ba bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed ngadag gi slong shing ge 'dun gyis songasu bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i chogs
444b2(brgyad stong): kyis mdun du rgyas te/ rlung 'di du da dag me da cid shA yig 'di cing kyis shes rab kyi rom du phyin pa di 'chad pa mdzang // 'di lta ste dper na d+mor snong gsum gyi ga chen
444b3(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing / byang chub sems dnga'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yige
444b4(brgyad stong): 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis khyab pa dang thos pa rgya mtsho dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du yang nam yang
444b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bral ma gyur to// skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du gyur pa de dang de dag du skyes te/ tha ni rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
444b6(brgyad stong): 'das ngag dang mi 'brel bar 'gyuraro// des mi rim pa thams cad ni spangs/ ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrub so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal po// 
444b7(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thad mkhyen po'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig par ba'o// kun dga'
444b8(brgyad stong): ba'i blas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tha~Mng mkhyen pa'i mi shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa 'di la srung bar bgyi'o// shes rab kyi rol du phyin pang / 
445a1(brgyad stong): mnyam par bya/ bzung bar ga/ bcing bar ga/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par ga bstan par bya/ nye bar bstan par bya lung 'gag par bya kha ton du bu bri bar bya/ de bzhinas
445a2(brgyad stong): pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ glegs pa ma chen po la rig gsal zhing rab tugs pa pa legs par bras te/ me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang phre pa dang / drug pa dang d+he ra pon pada'adang gdugs
445a3(brgyad stong): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / khadan dang / khor khor mug tu mer mo'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bkur bstir bya/ b+ha mar bya/ red par phyi mchod par bya/ ri mor bya bsnyen bkur byeste/ 
445a4(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i rje su bstan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
445a5(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lag so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston lcagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
445a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang bldan kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi lus byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / 
445a7(brgyad stong): dag gi las byams pa ming du'ing ba dang / mid kyi las rnams pa mi 'ong ba sa rnam gro smras te/ de ga bas na kun dga' bong lta nga zhugs te 'tsho zhing ba nos pa'i sa 'ong la ci ltar khyod kyis dga'
445a8(brgyad stong): bdang / dang bdang dad bang ga'i mar byas bkun dag ba na rang 'dus nas shes rababya 'dubyin pa 'dil mang byas shig/ kun dga' tsho nas shes rab kyi la rol du phyin pa 'di nubs
445b1(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi ma 'gyur bar kun dga' bo khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongasu gtong de/ rje su yongasu gtod/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
445b2(brgyad stong): 'di/ 'jig rten ci srid du rab tu spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun
445b3(brgyad stong): dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab 'byor/ rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston
445b4(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
445b5(brgyad stong): dril bu dang / ba dan ngag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam po mang po dag gis bkur bstir byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed pa'i sems de
445b6(brgyad stong): dag ni sangs rgyas mthang ba dang / ma tho chas can pa dang / dge 'dun pa'i ma 'gro byung ba dag / mtha' par rig par tham kun dga' ba sems sa ni dgon bldan ga
445b7(brgyad stong): rgyun byung bar byu par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'gyur shing de sa ces ga 'phrul pa dang / byang chub mams dpa'i sems papa chen pa rnams pa lasags pa
445b8(brgyad stong): nga byi na gyi 'byong ga meng ldan pa ga'i bu dang / zadang ldan pa kun dgang ba dang / lha rnams kyi nga grong rgya sbyin dang / lu nga mi dang / lAm min dang dri mar bcas pan
